   9181  f16f				   serviceatarivoxqueue
   9182  f16f				  -	      ifconst	AVOXVOICE
   9183  f16f				  -	      lda	voxlock
   9184  f16f				  -	      bne	skipvoxprocessing	; the vox is in the middle of speech address update
   9185  f16f				  -skipvoxqueuesizedec
   9186  f16f				  -	      jmp	processavoxvoice
   9187  f16f				  -skipvoxprocessing
   9188  f16f				  -	      rts
   9189  f16f				  -
   9190  f16f				  -processavoxvoice
   9191  f16f				  -	      ifconst	HSSUPPORT
   9192  f16f				  -			; ** we skip speech if hi-score is on and no vox was detected
   9193  f16f				  -			; ** this is to avoid later collision with snes pads.
   9194  f16f				  -	      lda	hsdevice
   9195  f16f				  -	      and	#2
   9196  f16f				  -	      beq	processavoxvoicereturn
   9197  f16f				  -	      endif		; HSSUPPORT

   9200  f16f				  -	      SPKOUT	tempavox
   9201  f16f				  -	      rts
   9202  f16f				  -avoxfixport
   9203  f16f				  -	      lda	#0	; restore the port to all bits as inputs...
   9204  f16f				  -	      sta	CTLSWA
   9205  f16f				  -	      rts
   9206  f16f				  -silenceavoxvoice
   9207  f16f				  -	      SPEAK	avoxsilentdata
   9208  f16f				  -processavoxvoicereturn

   9210  f16f				  -avoxsilentdata
   9211  f16f				  -	      .byte	31,255
   9212  f16f					      else

   9214  f170					      endif		; AVOXVOICE

   9223  f170				  -	      sta	port0control,x
   9224  f170				  -	      jsr	snes2atari_signal_go
   9225  f170				  -	      lda	port0control,x

   9233  f170				   joybuttonpadhandler
   9234  f170		       ad 31 21 	      lda	sSWCHA	; clear previous dirs for this pad, from
   9235  f173		       1d c2 f1 	      ora	SWCHA_DIRMASK,x	; our sSWCHA nibble.
   9236  f176		       8d 31 21 	      sta	sSWCHA
   9237  f179		       ad 80 02 	      lda	SWCHA	; load th actual joystick dirs, ensuring
   9238  f17c		       1d c3 f1 	      ora	SWCHA_DIRMASK+1,x	; we don't change the other nibble.
   9239  f17f		       2d 31 21 	      and	sSWCHA
   9240  f182		       8d 31 21 	      sta	sSWCHA
   9241  f185				   joybuttonhandler

   9244  f187		       a8		      tay

   9251  f194		       1d 02 21 	      ora	sINPT1,x
   9252  f197		       9d 02 21 	      sta	sINPT1,x
   9253  f19a

   9379  f205				   servicesfxchannelsloop
   9380  f205		       e8		      inx
   9381  f206					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   9382  f206		       e0 02		      cpx	#2
   9383  f208				  -	      else
   9384  f208				  -	      cpx	#1
   9385  f208					      endif
   9386  f208		       f0 f8		      beq	servicesfxchannelsdone
   9387  f20a
   9388  f20a		       a5 de		      lda	sfxschedulelock	; =1 if locked
   9389  f20c		       d0 f4		      bne	servicesfxchannelsdone	; exit if a pointer may be mid-way change
   9390  f20e
   9391  f20e		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   9392  f210		       85 dc		      sta	inttemp5
   9393  f212		       15 50		      ora	sfx1pointhi,x
   9394  f214		       f0 ef		      beq	servicesfxchannelsloop
   9395  f216		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   9396  f218		       85 dd		      sta	inttemp6
   9397  f21a
   9398  f21a		       b5 58		      lda	sfx1tick,x
   9399  f21c		       f0 05		      beq	servicesfx_cont1	; this chunk is over, load the next!
   9400  f21e		       d6 58		      dec	sfx1tick,x	; frame countdown is non-zero, subtract one
   9401  f220		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   9402  f223				   servicesfx_cont1
   9403  f223
   9404  f223		       a0 01		      ldy	#1	; check to see if they're changing the frame countdown
   9405  f225		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   9406  f227		       c9 10		      cmp	#$10
   9407  f229		       d0 1b		      bne	servicesfx_cont1a
   9408  f22b		       a0 02		      ldy	#2
   9409  f22d		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   9410  f22f		       95 56		      sta	sfx1frames,x	; change the frame countdown
   9411  f231		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   9412  f233		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   9413  f235							; advance the sound pointer by 3...
   9414  f235		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   9415  f237		       18		      clc
   9416  f238		       69 03		      adc	#3
   9417  f23a		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   9418  f23c		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   9419  f23e		       69 00		      adc	#0
   9420  f240		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   9421  f242							; and then fetch another sample for this channel...
   9422  f242		       ca		      dex
   9423  f243		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   9424  f246				   servicesfx_cont1a
   9425  f246
   9426  f246		       b5 56		      lda	sfx1frames,x	; set the frame countdown for this sound chunk
   9427  f248		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   9428  f24a
   9429  f24a		       b5 52		      lda	sfx1priority,x	; decrease the sound's priority if its non-zero
   9430  f24c		       f0 02		      beq	servicesfx_cont2
   9431  f24e		       d6 52		      dec	sfx1priority,x
   9432  f250				   servicesfx_cont2
   9433  f250
   9434  f250		       a0 00		      ldy	#0	; play the sound
   9435  f252		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   9436  f254		       85 d8		      sta	inttemp1
   9437  f256
   9438  f256				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   9439  f256				  -	      lda	sfx1notedata,x
   9440  f256				  -	      beq	exitmusictracker	; exit if this isn't a pitched instrument
   9441  f256				  -	      ldy	#0
   9442  f256				  -	      sty	inttemp2
   9443  f256				  -	      clc
   9444  f256				  -	      adc	(inttemp5),y
   9445  f256				  -	      asl		; x2
   9446  f256				  -	      tay
   9447  f256				  -	      lda	tiatrackeroctavenotes,y
   9448  f256				  -	      sta	AUDC0,x
   9449  f256				  -	      iny
   9450  f256				  -	      lda	tiatrackeroctavenotes,y
   9451  f256				  -	      sta	AUDF0,x
   9452  f256				  -	      ldy	#1
   9453  f256				  -	      jmp	sfxvolumeentrypt
   9454  f256				  -exitmusictracker
   9455  f256				  -	      lda	inttemp1
   9456  f256					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   9457  f256
   9458  f256		       18		      clc
   9459  f257		       75 54		      adc	sfx1poffset,x	; take into account any pitch modification
   9460  f259		       95 17		      sta	AUDF0,x
   9461  f25b		       c8		      iny
   9462  f25c		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   9463  f25e		       95 15		      sta	AUDC0,x
   9464  f260		       85 d9		      sta	inttemp2
   9465  f262		       c8		      iny
   9466  f263				   sfxvolumeentrypt
   9467  f263				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
   9468  f263				  -	      lda	tiavolume
   9469  f263				  -	      asl
   9470  f263				  -	      asl
   9471  f263				  -	      asl
   9472  f263				  -	      asl
   9473  f263				  -	      sta	fourbitfadevalueint
   9474  f263					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
   9475  f263		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   9476  f265				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
   9477  f265				  -	      jsr	fourbitfadeint
   9478  f265					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
   9479  f265		       95 19		      sta	AUDV0,x
   9480  f267		       c9 10		      cmp	#$10
   9481  f269		       b0 19		      bcs	sfxsoundloop	; AUDV0>$0F means the sound is looped while priority is active
   9482  f26b
   9483  f26b		       05 d9		      ora	inttemp2
   9484  f26d		       05 d8		      ora	inttemp1	; check if F|C|V=0
   9485  f26f		       f0 23		      beq	zerosfx	; if so, we're at the end of the sound.
   9486  f271
   9487  f271				   advancesfxpointer
   9488  f271							; advance the pointer to the next sound chunk
   9489  f271		       c8		      iny
   9490  f272		       84 da		      sty	inttemp3
   9491  f274		       18		      clc
   9492  f275		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   9493  f277		       65 da		      adc	inttemp3
   9494  f279		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   9495  f27b		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   9496  f27d		       69 00		      adc	#0
   9497  f27f		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   9498  f281		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   9499  f284
   9500  f284				   sfxsoundloop
   9501  f284		       48		      pha
   9502  f285		       b5 52		      lda	sfx1priority,x
   9503  f287		       d0 04		      bne	sfxsoundloop_carryon
   9504  f289		       68		      pla		; fix the stack before we go
   9505  f28a		       4c 71 f2 	      jmp	advancesfxpointer
   9506  f28d				   sfxsoundloop_carryon
   9507  f28d		       68		      pla
   9508  f28e		       29 f0		      and	#$F0
   9509  f290		       4a		      lsr
   9510  f291		       4a		      lsr
   9511  f292		       4a		      lsr
   9512  f293		       4a		      lsr
   9513  f294
   9514  f294				   zerosfx
   9515  f294		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   9516  f296		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   9517  f298		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   9518  f29a		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   9519  f29d
   9520  f29d
   9521  f29d				   schedulesfx
   9522  f29d							; called with sfxinstrumentlo=<data sfxinstrumenthi=>data sfxpitchoffset=pitch-offset sfxnoteindex=note index
   9523  f29d		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   9524  f29f				  -	      ifconst	pokeysupport
   9525  f29f				  -	      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   9526  f29f				  -	      beq	scheduletiasfx	; drums have undefined instrument
   9527  f29f				  -	      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9528  f29f				  -	      cmp	#$20	; POKEY?
   9529  f29f				  -	      bne	scheduletiasfx
   9530  f29f				  -	      jmp	schedulepokeysfx
   9531  f29f					      endif
   9532  f29f				   scheduletiasfx
   9533  f29f							;cmp #$10 ; TIA?
   9534  f29f							;beq continuescheduletiasfx
   9535  f29f							; rts ; unhandled!!!
   9536  f29f				   continuescheduletiasfx
   9537  f29f					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   9538  f29f		       a5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi
   9539  f2a1		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx1	;if channel 1 is idle, use it
   9540  f2a3		       a5 51		      lda	sfx2pointhi
   9541  f2a5		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx2	;if channel 2 is idle, use it
   9542  f2a7							; Both channels are scheduled.
   9543  f2a7		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   9544  f2a9		       f0 06		      beq	skipscheduledrums
   9545  f2ab		       a0 01		      ldy	#1
   9546  f2ad		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9547  f2af		       d0 01		      bne	interruptsfx
   9548  f2b1				   skipscheduledrums
   9549  f2b1		       60		      rts		; the new sound has 0 priority and both channels are busy. Skip playing it.
   9550  f2b2				   interruptsfx
   9551  f2b2							;Compare which active sound has a lower priority. We'll interrupt the lower one.
   9552  f2b2		       a5 52		      lda	sfx1priority
   9553  f2b4		       c5 53		      cmp	sfx2priority
   9554  f2b6		       b0 04		      bcs	schedulesfx2
   9555  f2b8					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   9556  f2b8
   9557  f2b8				   schedulesfx1
   9558  f2b8		       a2 00		      ldx	#0	; channel 1
   9559  f2ba					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   9560  f2ba		       f0 02		      beq	skipschedulesfx2
   9561  f2bc				   schedulesfx2
   9562  f2bc		       a2 01		      ldx	#1	; channel 2
   9563  f2be				   skipschedulesfx2
   9564  f2be					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   9565  f2be
   9566  f2be				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   9567  f2be				  -	      lda	sfxnoteindex
   9568  f2be				  -	      bpl	skipdrumkitoverride
   9569  f2be				  -	      and	#$7F	; subtract 128
   9570  f2be				  -	      sec
   9571  f2be				  -	      sbc	#4	; drums start at 132, i.e. octave 10
   9572  f2be				  -	      asl
   9573  f2be				  -	      tay
   9574  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   9575  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumentlo
   9576  f2be				  -	      iny
   9577  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   9578  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumenthi
   9579  f2be				  -	      lda	#0
   9580  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxnoteindex	; and tell the driver it's a non-pitched instrument
   9581  f2be				  -skipdrumkitoverride
   9582  f2be					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   9583  f2be		       a0 01		      ldy	#1	; get priority and sound-resolution (in frames)
   9584  f2c0		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9585  f2c2		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   9586  f2c4		       c8		      iny
   9587  f2c5		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9588  f2c7		       95 56		      sta	sfx1frames,x
   9589  f2c9		       a5 e0		      lda	sfxinstrumentlo
   9590  f2cb		       18		      clc
   9591  f2cc		       69 03		      adc	#3
   9592  f2ce		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   9593  f2d0		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   9594  f2d2		       69 00		      adc	#0
   9595  f2d4		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   9596  f2d6		       a5 e2		      lda	sfxpitchoffset
   9597  f2d8		       95 54		      sta	sfx1poffset,x
   9598  f2da		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   9599  f2dc		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   9600  f2de		       a5 e3		      lda	sfxnoteindex
   9601  f2e0		       95 cd		      sta	sfx1notedata,x
   9602  f2e2		       60		      rts
   9603  f2e3
   9604  f2e3				   plotsprite
   9605  f2e3					      ifnconst	NODRAWWAIT
   9606  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9607  f2e3				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   9608  f2e3				  -	      bne	skipplotspritewait
   9609  f2e3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9610  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9611  f2e3				  -	      lda	#$41
   9612  f2e3				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9613  f2e3					      endif
   9614  f2e3				   plotspritewait
   9615  f2e3		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   9616  f2e5		       d0 fc		      bne	plotspritewait
   9617  f2e7				   skipplotspritewait
   9618  f2e7				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9619  f2e7				  -	      lda	#$0
   9620  f2e7				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9621  f2e7					      endif
   9622  f2e7					      endif
   9623  f2e7
   9624  f2e7							;arguments:
   9625  f2e7							; temp1=lo graphicdata
   9626  f2e7							; temp2=hi graphicdata
   9627  f2e7							; temp3=palette | width byte
   9628  f2e7							; temp4=x
   9629  f2e7							; temp5=y
   9630  f2e7							; temp6=mode
   9631  f2e7		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   9632  f2e9		       4a		      lsr		; 2 - Divide by 8 or 16
   9633  f2ea		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   9634  f2eb		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   9635  f2ec					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   9636  f2ec		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   9637  f2ed					      endif
   9638  f2ed
   9639  f2ed		       aa		      tax
   9640  f2ee
   9641  f2ee					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
   9642  f2ee
   9643  f2ee							; the next block allows for vertical masking, and ensures we don't overwrite non-DL memory
   9644  f2ee
   9645  f2ee		       c9 0c		      cmp	#WZONECOUNT
   9646  f2f0
   9647  f2f0		       90 0a		      bcc	continueplotsprite1	; the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
   9648  f2f2							; otherwise, check to see if the bottom half is in zone 0...
   9649  f2f2
   9650  f2f2					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   9651  f2f2		       c9 0f		      cmp	#15
   9652  f2f4				  -	      else
   9653  f2f4				  -	      cmp	#31
   9654  f2f4					      endif
   9655  f2f4
   9656  f2f4		       d0 05		      bne	exitplotsprite1
   9657  f2f6		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
   9658  f2f8		       4c 31 f3 	      jmp	continueplotsprite2
   9659  f2fb				   exitplotsprite1
   9660  f2fb		       60		      rts
   9661  f2fc
   9662  f2fc				   continueplotsprite1
   9663  f2fc					      endif
   9664  f2fc
   9665  f2fc				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9666  f2fc				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   9667  f2fc				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   9668  f2fc					      else		; !VSCROLL
   9669  f2fc		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that this sprite starts in
   9670  f2ff					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   9671  f2ff				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9672  f2ff				  -	      clc
   9673  f2ff				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   9674  f2ff					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9675  f2ff		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   9676  f301				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9677  f301				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   9678  f301					      else		; !VSCROLL
   9679  f301		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   9680  f304					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   9681  f304				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9682  f304				  -	      adc	#0
   9683  f304					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9684  f304		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   9685  f306
   9686  f306							;Create DL entry for upper part of sprite
   9687  f306
   9688  f306		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   9689  f308
   9690  f308				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   9691  f308				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   9692  f308				  -	      beq	checkcontinueplotsprite2
   9693  f308				  -continueplotsprite1a
   9694  f308					      endif
   9695  f308
   9696  f308		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
   9697  f30a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;Low byte of data address
   9698  f30c
   9699  f30c					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   9700  f30c		       c8		      iny
   9701  f30d		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
   9702  f30f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9703  f311				  -	      else
   9704  f311				  -	      iny
   9705  f311				  -	      sty	temp8
   9706  f311					      endif
   9707  f311
   9708  f311		       c8		      iny
   9709  f312
   9710  f312		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   9711  f314		       29 0f		      and	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)
   9712  f316		       c9 01		      cmp	#1	; clear carry if our sprite is just in this zone
   9713  f318		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
   9714  f31a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9715  f31c
   9716  f31c		       c8		      iny
   9717  f31d		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   9718  f31f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9719  f321
   9720  f321		       c8		      iny
   9721  f322		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   9722  f324		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9723  f326
   9724  f326		       c8		      iny
   9725  f327		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
   9726  f329
   9727  f329				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
   9728  f329				  -	      iny
   9729  f329				  -	      lda	#0
   9730  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9731  f329					      endif
   9732  f329
   9733  f329				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   9734  f329				  -	      ldy	temp8
   9735  f329				  -	      lda	temp6
   9736  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9737  f329					      endif
   9738  f329
   9739  f329				   checkcontinueplotsprite2
   9740  f329
   9741  f329		       90 33		      bcc	doneSPDL	;branch if the sprite was fully in the last zone
   9742  f32b
   9743  f32b							;Create DL entry for lower part of sprite
   9744  f32b
   9745  f32b		       e8		      inx		;Next region
   9746  f32c
   9747  f32c					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
   9748  f32c		       e0 0c		      cpx	#WZONECOUNT
   9749  f32e
   9750  f32e		       90 01		      bcc	continueplotsprite2	; the second half of the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
   9751  f330		       60		      rts
   9752  f331				   continueplotsprite2
   9753  f331					      endif
   9754  f331
   9755  f331				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9756  f331				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   9757  f331				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   9758  f331					      else		; !VSCROLL
   9759  f331		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to next DL
   9760  f334					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   9761  f334				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9762  f334				  -	      clc
   9763  f334				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   9764  f334					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9765  f334		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   9766  f336				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9767  f336				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   9768  f336					      else		; !VSCROLL
   9769  f336		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   9770  f339					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   9771  f339				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9772  f339				  -	      adc	#0
   9773  f339					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9774  f339		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   9775  f33b		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   9776  f33d
   9777  f33d				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   9778  f33d				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   9779  f33d				  -	      bne	continueplotsprite2a
   9780  f33d				  -	      rts
   9781  f33d				  -continueplotsprite2a
   9782  f33d					      endif
   9783  f33d
   9784  f33d		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
   9785  f33f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9786  f341
   9787  f341					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   9788  f341		       c8		      iny
   9789  f342		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
   9790  f344		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9791  f346				  -	      else
   9792  f346				  -	      iny
   9793  f346				  -	      sty	temp8
   9794  f346					      endif
   9795  f346
   9796  f346		       c8		      iny
   9797  f347
   9798  f347		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   9799  f349		       0b 0f		      anc	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)	; undocumented. A=A&IMM, then move bit 7 into carry
   9800  f34b		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
   9801  f34d		       e9 0f		      sbc	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)	; start at the DMA hole. -1 because carry is clear
   9802  f34f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9803  f351
   9804  f351		       c8		      iny
   9805  f352
   9806  f352		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   9807  f354		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9808  f356
   9809  f356		       c8		      iny
   9810  f357
   9811  f357		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   9812  f359		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9813  f35b
   9814  f35b		       c8		      iny
   9815  f35c		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
   9816  f35e
   9817  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
   9818  f35e				  -	      iny
   9819  f35e				  -	      lda	#0
   9820  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9821  f35e					      endif
   9822  f35e
   9823  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   9824  f35e				  -	      ldy	temp8
   9825  f35e				  -	      lda	temp6
   9826  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9827  f35e					      endif
   9828  f35e
   9829  f35e				   doneSPDL
   9830  f35e		       60		      rts
   9831  f35f
   9832  f35f				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9833  f35f				  -			; x3 table for fast DLL parsing
   9834  f35f				  -Xx3
   9835  f35f				  -	      .byte	0,3,6,9,12,15,18,21,24,27
   9836  f35f				  -	      .byte	30,33,36,39,42,45,48,51,54,57
   9837  f35f				  -	      .byte	60,63,66,69,72,75,78,81,84,87
   9838  f35f				  -maskscrollsprite
   9839  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%11000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),0,160	; 5*2 + 32*3 = 106 cycles
   9840  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   9841  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   9842  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   9843  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%01000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),16,160	; 5*2 + 16*3 =  58 cycles
   9844  f35f				  -			; MAX	============ 467 cycles
   9845  f35f				  -			; MIN	============  59 cycles
   9846  f35f				  -maskscrollspriteend
   9847  f35f					      endif		; VSCROLL
   9848  f35f
   9849  f35f				   lockzonex
   9850  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   9851  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   9852  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   9853  f35f				  -	      beq	lockzonexreturn	; the zone is either stuffed or locked. abort!
   9854  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   9855  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9856  f35f				  -	      clc
   9857  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   9858  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9859  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   9860  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   9861  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9862  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
   9863  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9864  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   9865  f35f				  -	      iny
   9866  f35f				  -	      lda	#0
   9867  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9868  f35f				  -	      dey
   9869  f35f				  -	      tya
   9870  f35f				  -	      ldy	#(DLLASTOBJ-1)
   9871  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9872  f35f				  -	      iny
   9873  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
   9874  f35f				  -lockzonexreturn
   9875  f35f				  -	      rts
   9876  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
   9877  f35f				   unlockzonex
   9878  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   9879  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   9880  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   9881  f35f				  -	      bne	unlockzonexreturn	; if the zone isn't stuffed, it's not locked. abort!
   9882  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   9883  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9884  f35f				  -	      clc
   9885  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   9886  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9887  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   9888  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   9889  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9890  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
   9891  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9892  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   9893  f35f				  -	      dey
   9894  f35f				  -	      lda	(dlpnt),y
   9895  f35f				  -	      tay
   9896  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
   9897  f35f				  -unlockzonexreturn
   9898  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
   9899  f35f		       60		      rts
   9900  f360
   9901  f360				   plotcharloop
   9902  f360							; ** read from a data indirectly pointed to from temp8,temp9
   9903  f360							; ** format is: lo_data, hi_data, palette|width, x, y
   9904  f360							; ** format ends with lo_data | hi_data = 0
   9905  f360
   9906  f360				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9907  f360				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   9908  f360				  -	      bne	skipplotcharloopwait
   9909  f360					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9910  f360				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9911  f360				  -	      lda	#$61
   9912  f360				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9913  f360					      endif
   9914  f360				   plotcharloopwait
   9915  f360		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   9916  f362		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharloopwait
   9917  f364				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9918  f364				  -	      lda	#0
   9919  f364				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9920  f364					      endif
   9921  f364				   skipplotcharloopwait
   9922  f364				   plotcharlooploop
   9923  f364		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   9924  f366		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   9925  f368		       85 42		      sta	temp1
   9926  f36a		       c8		      iny
   9927  f36b		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   9928  f36d		       85 43		      sta	temp2
   9929  f36f		       05 42		      ora	temp1
   9930  f371		       d0 01		      bne	plotcharloopcontinue
   9931  f373							;the pointer=0, so return
   9932  f373		       60		      rts
   9933  f374				   plotcharloopcontinue
   9934  f374		       c8		      iny
   9935  f375		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   9936  f377		       85 44		      sta	temp3
   9937  f379		       c8		      iny
   9938  f37a		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   9939  f37c		       85 45		      sta	temp4
   9940  f37e		       c8		      iny
   9941  f37f		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   9942  f381							;sta temp5 ; not needed with our late entry.
   9943  f381		       20 9a f3 	      jsr	plotcharactersskipentry
   9944  f384		       a5 49		      lda	temp8
   9945  f386		       18		      clc
   9946  f387		       69 05		      adc	#5
   9947  f389		       85 49		      sta	temp8
   9948  f38b		       a5 4a		      lda	temp9
   9949  f38d		       69 00		      adc	#0
   9950  f38f		       85 4a		      sta	temp9
   9951  f391		       4c 64 f3 	      jmp	plotcharlooploop
   9952  f394
   9953  f394				   plotcharacters
   9954  f394				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9955  f394				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   9956  f394				  -	      bne	skipplotcharacterswait
   9957  f394					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9958  f394				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9959  f394				  -	      lda	#$41
   9960  f394				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9961  f394					      endif
   9962  f394				   plotcharacterswait
   9963  f394		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   9964  f396		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharacterswait
   9965  f398				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9966  f398				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9967  f398					      endif
   9968  f398				   skipplotcharacterswait
   9969  f398							;arguments:
   9970  f398							; temp1=lo charactermap
   9971  f398							; temp2=hi charactermap
   9972  f398							; temp3=palette | width byte
   9973  f398							; temp4=x
   9974  f398							; temp5=y
   9975  f398
   9976  f398		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   9977  f39a
   9978  f39a				   plotcharactersskipentry
   9979  f39a
   9980  f39a							;ifconst ZONEHEIGHT
   9981  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 16
   9982  f39a							; and #$0F
   9983  f39a							; endif
   9984  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 8
   9985  f39a							; and #$1F
   9986  f39a							; endif
   9987  f39a							;else
   9988  f39a							; and #$0F
   9989  f39a							;endif
   9990  f39a
   9991  f39a		       aa		      tax
   9992  f39b
   9993  f39b				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9994  f39b				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   9995  f39b				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   9996  f39b					      else		; !VSCROLL
   9997  f39b		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
   9998  f39e					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   9999  f39e				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10000  f39e				  -	      clc
  10001  f39e				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
  10002  f39e					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10003  f39e		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
  10004  f3a0				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10005  f3a0				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
  10006  f3a0					      else		; !VSCROLL
  10007  f3a0		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
  10008  f3a3					      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10009  f3a3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10010  f3a3				  -	      adc	#0
  10011  f3a3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10012  f3a3		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
  10013  f3a5
  10014  f3a5							;Create DL entry for the characters
  10015  f3a5
  10016  f3a5		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
  10017  f3a7
  10018  f3a7				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
  10019  f3a7				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10020  f3a7				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacters
  10021  f3a7				  -	      rts
  10022  f3a7				  -continueplotcharacters
  10023  f3a7					      endif
  10024  f3a7
  10025  f3a7		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
  10026  f3a9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
  10027  f3ab
  10028  f3ab		       c8		      iny
  10029  f3ac		       ad 06 21 	      lda	charactermode
  10030  f3af		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
  10031  f3b1
  10032  f3b1		       c8		      iny
  10033  f3b2		       a5 43		      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
  10034  f3b4		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
  10035  f3b6
  10036  f3b6		       c8		      iny
  10037  f3b7		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
  10038  f3b9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
  10039  f3bb

  10041  f3bc		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
  10042  f3be		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
  10043  f3c0
  10044  f3c0		       c8		      iny
  10045  f3c1		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
  10046  f3c3		       60		      rts
  10047  f3c4
  10048  f3c4
  10049  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10050  f3c4				  -plotcharacterslive
  10051  f3c4				  -			; a version of plotcharacters that draws live and minimally disrupts the screen...
  10052  f3c4				  -
  10053  f3c4				  -			;arguments:
  10054  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
  10055  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
  10056  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
  10057  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
  10058  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
  10059  f3c4				  -
  10060  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp5	;Y position
  10061  f3c4				  -
  10062  f3c4				  -	      tax
  10063  f3c4				  -
  10064  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10065  f3c4				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
  10066  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
  10067  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
  10068  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
  10069  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10070  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10071  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10072  f3c4				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
  10073  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10074  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt
  10075  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10076  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
  10077  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
  10078  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
  10079  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10080  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10081  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
  10082  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10083  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
  10084  f3c4				  -
  10085  f3c4				  -			;Create DL entry for the characters
  10086  f3c4				  -
  10087  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
  10088  f3c4				  -
  10089  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
  10090  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10091  f3c4				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacterslive
  10092  f3c4				  -	      rts
  10093  f3c4				  -continueplotcharacterslive
  10094  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10095  f3c4				  -
  10096  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
  10097  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
  10098  f3c4				  -
  10099  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10100  f3c4				  -			; we don't add the second byte yet, since the charmap could briefly
  10101  f3c4				  -			; render without a proper character map address, width, or position.
  10102  f3c4				  -	      lda	charactermode
  10103  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
  10104  f3c4				  -
  10105  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10106  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
  10107  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
  10108  f3c4				  -
  10109  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10110  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp3	;palette|width
  10111  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
  10112  f3c4				  -
  10113  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10114  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
  10115  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
  10116  f3c4				  -
  10117  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10118  f3c4				  -	      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
  10119  f3c4				  -
  10120  f3c4				  -	      rts
  10121  f3c4					      endif		;plotcharacterslive
  10122  f3c4
  10123  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUE
  10124  f3c4				  -plotvalue
  10125  f3c4				  -			; calling 7800basic command:
  10126  f3c4				  -			; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
  10127  f3c4				  -			; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
  10128  f3c4				  -			;
  10129  f3c4				  -			; asm sub arguments:
  10130  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
  10131  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
  10132  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
  10133  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
  10134  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
  10135  f3c4				  -			; temp6=number of digits
  10136  f3c4				  -			; temp7=lo variable
  10137  f3c4				  -			; temp8=hi variable
  10138  f3c4				  -			; temp9=character mode
  10139  f3c4				  -
  10140  f3c4				  -plotdigitcount =	temp6
  10141  f3c4				  -
  10142  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
  10143  f3c4				  -	      ldx	temp5
  10144  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
  10145  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10146  f3c4				  -	      bne	carryonplotvalue
  10147  f3c4				  -	      rts
  10148  f3c4				  -carryonplotvalue
  10149  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10150  f3c4				  -
  10151  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
  10152  f3c4				  -	      tay
  10153  f3c4				  -	      ldx	valbufend
  10154  f3c4				  -
  10155  f3c4				  -	      lda	plotdigitcount
  10156  f3c4				  -	      and	#1
  10157  f3c4				  -	      beq	pvnibble2char
  10158  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
  10159  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x	; just in case we skip this digit
  10160  f3c4				  -	      beq	pvnibble2char_skipnibble
  10161  f3c4				  -
  10162  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char
  10163  f3c4				  -			; high nibble...
  10164  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
  10165  f3c4				  -	      and	#$f0
  10166  f3c4				  -	      lsr
  10167  f3c4				  -	      lsr
  10168  f3c4				  -	      lsr
  10169  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10170  f3c4				  -	      lsr
  10171  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10172  f3c4				  -
  10173  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10174  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10175  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10176  f3c4				  -	      inx
  10177  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
  10178  f3c4				  -
  10179  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char_skipnibble
  10180  f3c4				  -			; low nibble...
  10181  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
  10182  f3c4				  -	      and	#$0f
  10183  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10184  f3c4				  -	      asl
  10185  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10186  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10187  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10188  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10189  f3c4				  -	      inx
  10190  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10191  f3c4				  -
  10192  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
  10193  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2char
  10194  f3c4				  -
  10195  f3c4				  -			;point to the start of our valuebuffer
  10196  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10197  f3c4				  -	      lda	#<VALBUFFER
  10198  f3c4				  -	      adc	valbufend
  10199  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp1
  10200  f3c4				  -	      lda	#>VALBUFFER
  10201  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
  10202  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp2
  10203  f3c4				  -
  10204  f3c4				  -			;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
  10205  f3c4				  -	      stx	valbufend
  10206  f3c4				  -
  10207  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10208  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacters
  10209  f3c4				  -	      else
  10210  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
  10211  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10212  f3c4				  -
  10213  f3c4					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUE
  10214  f3c4
  10215  f3c4
  10216  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
  10217  f3c4				  -plotdigitcount =	temp6
  10218  f3c4				  -plotvalueextra
  10219  f3c4				  -			; calling 7800basic command:
  10220  f3c4				  -			; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
  10221  f3c4				  -			; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
  10222  f3c4				  -			;
  10223  f3c4				  -			; asm sub arguments:
  10224  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
  10225  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
  10226  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
  10227  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
  10228  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
  10229  f3c4				  -			; temp6=number of digits
  10230  f3c4				  -			; temp7=lo variable
  10231  f3c4				  -			; temp8=hi variable
  10232  f3c4				  -
  10233  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
  10234  f3c4				  -	      tay
  10235  f3c4				  -	      ldx	valbufend
  10236  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10237  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10238  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10239  f3c4				  -
  10240  f3c4				  -	      lda	plotdigitcount
  10241  f3c4				  -	      and	#1
  10242  f3c4				  -
  10243  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
  10244  f3c4				  -
  10245  f3c4				  -pvnibble2charextra
  10246  f3c4				  -			; high nibble...
  10247  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
  10248  f3c4				  -	      and	#$f0
  10249  f3c4				  -	      lsr
  10250  f3c4				  -	      lsr
  10251  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10252  f3c4				  -	      lsr
  10253  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10254  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10255  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10256  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10257  f3c4				  -	      inx
  10258  f3c4				  -
  10259  f3c4				  -			; second half of the digit
  10260  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10261  f3c4				  -	      adc	#1
  10262  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10263  f3c4				  -	      inx
  10264  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
  10265  f3c4				  -
  10266  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
  10267  f3c4				  -			; low nibble...
  10268  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
  10269  f3c4				  -	      and	#$0f
  10270  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10271  f3c4				  -	      asl
  10272  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10273  f3c4				  -	      asl
  10274  f3c4				  -
  10275  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10276  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10277  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10278  f3c4				  -	      inx
  10279  f3c4				  -
  10280  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10281  f3c4				  -	      adc	#1
  10282  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10283  f3c4				  -	      inx
  10284  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10285  f3c4				  -
  10286  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
  10287  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2charextra
  10288  f3c4				  -
  10289  f3c4				  -			;point to the start of our valuebuffer
  10290  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10291  f3c4				  -	      lda	#<VALBUFFER
  10292  f3c4				  -	      adc	valbufend
  10293  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp1
  10294  f3c4				  -	      lda	#>VALBUFFER
  10295  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
  10296  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp2
  10297  f3c4				  -
  10298  f3c4				  -			;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
  10299  f3c4				  -	      stx	valbufend
  10300  f3c4				  -
  10301  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10302  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacters
  10303  f3c4				  -	      else
  10304  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
  10305  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10306  f3c4					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
  10307  f3c4
  10308  f3c4				   boxcollision
  10309  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	BOXCOLLISION
  10310  f3c4				  -			; the worst case cycle-time for the code below is 43 cycles.
  10311  f3c4				  -			; unfortunately, prior to getting here we've burned 44 cycles in argument setup. eep!
  10312  f3c4				  -
  10313  f3c4				  -			;__boxx1 = accumulator
  10314  f3c4				  -			;__boxy1 = y
  10315  f3c4				  -__boxw1    =	temp3
  10316  f3c4				  -__boxh1    =	temp4
  10317  f3c4				  -
  10318  f3c4				  -__boxx2    =	temp5
  10319  f3c4				  -__boxy2    =	temp6
  10320  f3c4				  -__boxw2    =	temp7
  10321  f3c4				  -__boxh2    =	temp8
  10322  f3c4				  -
  10323  f3c4				  -DoXCollisionCheck
  10324  f3c4				  -			;lda __boxx1 ; skipped. already in the accumulator
  10325  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
  10326  f3c4				  -	      bcs	X1isbiggerthanX2	;2/3
  10327  f3c4				  -X2isbiggerthanX1
  10328  f3c4				  -			; carry is clear
  10329  f3c4				  -	      adc	__boxw1	;3
  10330  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
  10331  f3c4				  -	      bcs	DoYCollisionCheck	;3/2
  10332  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6 - carry clear, no collision
  10333  f3c4				  -X1isbiggerthanX2
  10334  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
  10335  f3c4				  -	      sbc	__boxw2	;3
  10336  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
  10337  f3c4				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
  10338  f3c4				  -DoYCollisionCheck
  10339  f3c4				  -	      tya		; 2 ; use to be "lda __boxy1"
  10340  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
  10341  f3c4				  -	      bcs	Y1isbiggerthanY2	;3/2
  10342  f3c4				  -Y2isbiggerthanY1
  10343  f3c4				  -			; carry is clear
  10344  f3c4				  -	      adc	__boxh1	;3
  10345  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
  10346  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
  10347  f3c4				  -Y1isbiggerthanY2
  10348  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
  10349  f3c4				  -	      sbc	__boxh2	;3
  10350  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
  10351  f3c4				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
  10352  f3c4				  -yesboxcollision
  10353  f3c4				  -	      sec		;2
  10354  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
  10355  f3c4				  -noboxcollision
  10356  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
  10357  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
  10358  f3c4					      endif		; BOXCOLLISION
  10359  f3c4
  10360  f3c4				   randomize
  10361  f3c4		       a5 40		      lda	rand
  10362  f3c6		       4a		      lsr
  10363  f3c7		       26 41		      rol	rand16
  10364  f3c9		       90 02		      bcc	noeor
  10365  f3cb		       49 b4		      eor	#$B4
  10366  f3cd				   noeor
  10367  f3cd		       85 40		      sta	rand
  10368  f3cf		       45 41		      eor	rand16
  10369  f3d1		       60		      rts
  10370  f3d2
  10371  f3d2							; *** bcd conversion routine courtesy Omegamatrix
  10372  f3d2							; *** http://atariage.com/forums/blog/563/entry-10832-hex-to-bcd-conversion-0-99/
  10373  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_converttobcd
  10374  f3d2				  -converttobcd
  10375  f3d2				  -			;value to convert is in the accumulator
  10376  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp1
  10377  f3d2				  -	      lsr
  10378  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
  10379  f3d2				  -	      ror
  10380  f3d2				  -	      lsr
  10381  f3d2				  -	      lsr
  10382  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
  10383  f3d2				  -	      ror
  10384  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
  10385  f3d2				  -	      ror
  10386  f3d2				  -	      lsr
  10387  f3d2				  -	      and	#$3C
  10388  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
  10389  f3d2				  -	      lsr
  10390  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp2
  10391  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
  10392  f3d2				  -	      rts		; return the result in the accumulator
  10393  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_converttobcd
  10394  f3d2
  10395  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul8
  10396  f3d2				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in A
  10397  f3d2				  -mul8
  10398  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
  10399  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
  10400  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
  10401  f3d2				  -reptmul8
  10402  f3d2				  -	      lsr	temp2
  10403  f3d2				  -	      bcc	skipmul8
  10404  f3d2				  -	      clc
  10405  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
  10406  f3d2				  -			;bcs donemul8 might save cycles?
  10407  f3d2				  -skipmul8
  10408  f3d2				  -			;beq donemul8 might save cycles?
  10409  f3d2				  -	      asl	temp1
  10410  f3d2				  -	      bne	reptmul8
  10411  f3d2				  -donemul8
  10412  f3d2				  -	      rts
  10413  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul8
  10414  f3d2
  10415  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div8
  10416  f3d2				  -div8
  10417  f3d2				  -			; A=numerator Y=denominator, result in A
  10418  f3d2				  -	      cpy	#2
  10419  f3d2				  -	      bcc	div8end+1	;div by 0 = bad, div by 1=no calc needed, so bail out
  10420  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
  10421  f3d2				  -	      ldy	#$ff
  10422  f3d2				  -div8loop
  10423  f3d2				  -	      sbc	temp1
  10424  f3d2				  -	      iny
  10425  f3d2				  -	      bcs	div8loop
  10426  f3d2				  -div8end
  10427  f3d2				  -	      tya
  10428  f3d2				  -			; result in A
  10429  f3d2				  -	      rts
  10430  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_div8
  10431  f3d2
  10432  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul16
  10433  f3d2				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in temp2,A=low, temp1=high
  10434  f3d2				  -mul16
  10435  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
  10436  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
  10437  f3d2				  -
  10438  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
  10439  f3d2				  -	      ldx	#8
  10440  f3d2				  -	      lsr	temp1
  10441  f3d2				  -mul16_1
  10442  f3d2				  -	      bcc	mul16_2
  10443  f3d2				  -	      clc
  10444  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp2
  10445  f3d2				  -mul16_2
  10446  f3d2				  -	      ror
  10447  f3d2				  -	      ror	temp1
  10448  f3d2				  -	      dex
  10449  f3d2				  -	      bne	mul16_1
  10450  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
  10451  f3d2				  -	      rts
  10452  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul16
  10453  f3d2
  10454  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div16
  10455  f3d2				  -			; div int/int
  10456  f3d2				  -			; numerator in A, denom in temp1
  10457  f3d2				  -			; returns with quotient in A, remainder in temp1
  10458  f3d2				  -div16
  10459  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
  10460  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
  10461  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
  10462  f3d2				  -	      ldx	#8
  10463  f3d2				  -	      asl	temp2
  10464  f3d2				  -div16_1
  10465  f3d2				  -	      rol
  10466  f3d2				  -	      cmp	temp1
  10467  f3d2				  -	      bcc	div16_2
  10468  f3d2				  -	      sbc	temp1
  10469  f3d2				  -div16_2
  10470  f3d2				  -	      rol	temp2
  10471  f3d2				  -	      dex
  10472  f3d2				  -	      bne	div16_1
  10473  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp1
  10474  f3d2				  -	      lda	temp2
  10475  f3d2				  -	      rts
  10476  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_div16
  10477  f3d2
  10478  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode

  10480  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  10481  f3d2				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  10482  f3d2				  -	      endif

  10523  f3de
  10524  f3de				  -	      ifconst	FINESCROLLENABLED
  10525  f3de				  -finescrolldlls
  10526  f3de				  -	      ldx	temp1	; first DLL index x3
  10527  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10528  f3de				  -	      and	#%11110000
  10529  f3de				  -	      ora	finescrolly
  10530  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10531  f3de				  -
  10532  f3de				  -	      ldx	temp2	; last DLL index x3
  10533  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10534  f3de				  -	      and	#%11110000
  10535  f3de				  -	      ora	finescrolly
  10536  f3de				  -	      eor	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)
  10537  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10538  f3de				  -	      rts
  10539  f3de					      endif		; FINESCROLLENABLED
  10540  f3de
  10541  f3de				  -	      ifconst	USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE
  10542  f3de				  -adjustvisible
  10543  f3de				  -			; called with temp1=first visible zone *3, temp2=last visible zone *3
  10544  f3de				  -	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
  10545  f3de				  -	      ldx	visibleDLLstart
  10546  f3de				  -findfirstinterrupt
  10547  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10548  f3de				  -	      bmi	foundfirstinterrupt
  10549  f3de				  -	      inx
  10550  f3de				  -	      inx
  10551  f3de				  -	      inx
  10552  f3de				  -	      bne	findfirstinterrupt
  10553  f3de				  -foundfirstinterrupt
  10554  f3de				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
  10555  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10556  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10557  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10558  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10559  f3de				  -	      ldx	overscanDLLstart
  10560  f3de				  -findlastinterrupt
  10561  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10562  f3de				  -	      bmi	foundlastinterrupt
  10563  f3de				  -	      dex
  10564  f3de				  -	      dex
  10565  f3de				  -	      dex
  10566  f3de				  -	      bne	findlastinterrupt
  10567  f3de				  -foundlastinterrupt
  10568  f3de				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
  10569  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10570  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10571  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10572  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10573  f3de				  -			;now we need to set the new interrupts
  10574  f3de				  -	      clc
  10575  f3de				  -	      lda	temp1
  10576  f3de				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
  10577  f3de				  -	      tax
  10578  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10579  f3de				  -	      ora	#%10000000
  10580  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10581  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10582  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10583  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10584  f3de				  -	      clc
  10585  f3de				  -	      lda	temp2
  10586  f3de				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
  10587  f3de				  -	      tax
  10588  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10589  f3de				  -	      ora	#%10000000
  10590  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10591  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10592  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10593  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10594  f3de				  -	      jsr	vblankresync
  10595  f3de				  -	      rts
  10596  f3de					      endif		; USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE
  10597  f3de
  10598  f3de				   vblankresync
  10599  f3de		       20 4e f4 	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
  10600  f3e1		       a9 00		      lda	#0
  10601  f3e3		       85 4d		      sta	visibleover
  10602  f3e5		       a9 03		      lda	#3
  10603  f3e7		       8d b2 01 	      sta	interruptindex
  10604  f3ea		       60		      rts
  10605  f3eb
  10606  f3eb				   createallgamedlls
  10607  f3eb		       a0 3c		      ldy	#(DLLLUTEND-DLLLUT)
  10608  f3ed				   createallgamedllsloop
  10609  f3ed		       88		      dey
  10610  f3ee		       b9 12 f4 	      lda	DLLLUT,y
  10611  f3f1		       99 00 18 	      sta	DLLMEM,y
  10612  f3f4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10613  f3f4				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,y
  10614  f3f4					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10615  f3f4		       c0 00		      cpy	#0
  10616  f3f6		       d0 f5		      bne	createallgamedllsloop
  10617  f3f8
  10618  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10619  f3f8				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
  10620  f3f8				  -fixdoublebuffer
  10621  f3f8				  -	      dey
  10622  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10623  f3f8				  -	      clc
  10624  f3f8				  -	      adc	#DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET
  10625  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10626  f3f8				  -	      dey
  10627  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10628  f3f8				  -	      adc	#0
  10629  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10630  f3f8				  -	      dey
  10631  f3f8				  -	      bne	fixdoublebuffer
  10632  f3f8					      endif
  10633  f3f8
  10634  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM
  10635  f3f8				  -			; N.B. banksets doesn't in-fact allow DL in cart-ram, so this conditional
  10636  f3f8				  -			; is always skipped. This is here in case some day the limitation is
  10637  f3f8				  -			; worked around, but it's untested.
  10638  f3f8				  -
  10639  f3f8				  -			; With bankset cart ram, we added $8000 to the DL address so plot
  10640  f3f8				  -			; functions would hit the cart-ram write-address. We need to subtract $80
  10641  f3f8				  -			; so Maria will read from the cart-ram read-address.
  10642  f3f8				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
  10643  f3f8				  -fixbanksetaddresses
  10644  f3f8				  -	      dey
  10645  f3f8				  -	      dey
  10646  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10647  f3f8				  -	      and	#%01111111
  10648  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10649  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10650  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10651  f3f8				  -	      and	#%01111111
  10652  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10653  f3f8				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10654  f3f8				  -	      dey
  10655  f3f8				  -	      bne	fixbanksetaddresses
  10656  f3f8					      endif		; BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM

  10801  f457				  -
  10802  f457				  -			; ensure we don't flip mid-display. otherwise the displayed DL will be the one the game is working on.
  10803  f457				  -

  10815  f457				  -	      tax

  10837  f457				  -	      beq	flipdisplaybufferreturn
  10838  f457				  -
  10839  f457				  -			; The doublebuffer buffer is dirty, so the game code must have issued a savescreen recently.
  10840  f457				  -			; To make savescreen work with the new working buffer, we need to copy over the saved objects
  10841  f457				  -			; from the displayed buffer to the working buffer...

  10902  f457				  -rotationalcompare

  10904  f457				  -	      .byte	$00, $01, $ff, $00	; new=00
  10905  f457				  -	      .byte	$ff, $00, $00, $01	; new=01
  10906  f457				  -	      .byte	$01, $00, $00, $ff	; new=10
  10907  f457				  -	      .byte	$00, $ff, $01, $00	; new=11
  10908  f457				  -

  10917  f457				  -	      .byte	%0001, %0001, %0011, %0011

  10922  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
  10923  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011

  10935  f457				  -	      .byte	%0100, %0101, %0110, %0111
  10936  f457				  -	      .byte	%1000, %1001, %1010, %1011
  10937  f457				  -	      .byte	%1100, %1101, %1110, %1111

  10941  f457
  10942  f457				   mouse0update
  10943  f457				  -	      ifconst	MOUSE0SUPPORT
  10944  f457				  -
  10945  f457				  -mousetableselect =	inttemp2
  10946  f457				  -mousexdelta =	inttemp3
  10947  f457				  -mouseydelta =	inttemp4
  10948  f457				  -lastSWCHA  =	inttemp6
  10949  f457				  -
  10950  f457				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  10951  f457				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  10952  f457				  -
  10953  f457				  -	      lda	#$ff
  10954  f457				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  10955  f457				  -
  10956  f457				  -	      ldy	port0control
  10957  f457				  -
  10958  f457				  -	      lda	#%00010000
  10959  f457				  -	      cpy	#9	; AMIGA?
  10960  f457				  -	      bne	skipamigabitsfix0
  10961  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  10962  f457				  -skipamigabitsfix0
  10963  f457				  -	      sta	mousetableselect
  10964  f457				  -	      ifconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  10965  f457				  -	      cpy	#6	; DRIVING?
  10966  f457				  -	      bne	skipdriving0setup
  10967  f457				  -			; swap mousex0 and mousey0. mousex seen by the 7800basic program
  10968  f457				  -			; trails the actual mousex0, so we can smoothly interpolate toward
  10969  f457				  -			; the actual position. This actual position is stored in mousey0
  10970  f457				  -			; after the driver has run.
  10971  f457				  -	      ldx	mousex0
  10972  f457				  -	      lda	mousey0
  10973  f457				  -	      stx	mousey0
  10974  f457				  -	      sta	mousex0
  10975  f457				  -skipdriving0setup
  10976  f457				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  10977  f457				  -
  10978  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  10979  f457				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  10980  f457				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  10981  f457				  -
  10982  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSETIME
  10983  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  10984  f457				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  10985  f457				  -	      else
  10986  f457				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  10987  f457				  -	      endif
  10988  f457				  -	      else
  10989  f457				  -	      lda	#MOUSETIME
  10990  f457				  -	      endif
  10991  f457				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  10992  f457				  -
  10993  f457				  -mouse0updateloop
  10994  f457				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  10995  f457				  -	      asr	#%11110000	; Undocumented. A = A & #IMM, then LSR A.
  10996  f457				  -	      cmp	lastSWCHA
  10997  f457				  -	      beq	mouse0loopcondition
  10998  f457				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  10999  f457				  -	      lsr
  11000  f457				  -	      lsr
  11001  f457				  -	      lsr
  11002  f457				  -
  11003  f457				  -	      ora	mousetableselect	; atari/amiga decoding table selection
  11004  f457				  -
  11005  f457				  -			; st mice encode on different bits/joystick-lines than amiga mice...
  11006  f457				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  11007  f457				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  11008  f457				  -			; ...so can shuffle the amiga bits to reuse the st driver.
  11009  f457				  -	      tay
  11010  f457				  -	      lax	amigatoataribits,y
  11011  f457				  -
  11012  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11013  f457				  -			; first the Y...
  11014  f457				  -	      and	#%00001100
  11015  f457				  -	      ora	mousecodey0
  11016  f457				  -	      tay
  11017  f457				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11018  f457				  -	      clc
  11019  f457				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11020  f457				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  11021  f457				  -	      tya
  11022  f457				  -	      lsr
  11023  f457				  -	      lsr
  11024  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11025  f457				  -	      txa
  11026  f457				  -			; ...then the X...
  11027  f457				  -	      and	#%00000011
  11028  f457				  -	      tax
  11029  f457				  -	      endif		; !MOUSEXONLY
  11030  f457				  -
  11031  f457				  -	      asl
  11032  f457				  -	      asl
  11033  f457				  -	      ora	mousecodex0
  11034  f457				  -	      tay
  11035  f457				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11036  f457				  -	      adc	mousexdelta	; carry was clear by previous ASL
  11037  f457				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11038  f457				  -	      stx	mousecodex0
  11039  f457				  -mouse0loopcondition
  11040  f457				  -	      lda	TIMINT
  11041  f457				  -	      bpl	mouse0updateloop
  11042  f457				  -
  11043  f457				  -			; *** adapt to selected device resolution.
  11044  f457				  -	      ldx	port0control
  11045  f457				  -
  11046  f457				  -	      ifconst	PRECISIONMOUSING
  11047  f457				  -	      ldy	port0resolution
  11048  f457				  -	      bne	mouse0halveddone
  11049  f457				  -	      cpx	#6	; half-resolution is no good for driving wheels
  11050  f457				  -	      beq	mouse0halveddone
  11051  f457				  -			; resolution=0 is half mouse resolution, necessary for precision
  11052  f457				  -			; mousing on a 160x240 screen with a 1000 dpi mouse.
  11053  f457				  -
  11054  f457				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11055  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11056  f457				  -	      ror		; do a signed divide by 2.
  11057  f457				  -	      clc
  11058  f457				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11059  f457				  -	      sta	mousex0
  11060  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11061  f457				  -	      lda	mouseydelta
  11062  f457				  -	      clc
  11063  f457				  -	      adc	mousey0
  11064  f457				  -	      sta	mousey0
  11065  f457				  -	      endif
  11066  f457				  -			; at half resolution we just exit after updating x and y
  11067  f457				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11068  f457				  -mouse0halveddone
  11069  f457				  -	      endif		; PRECISIONMOUSING
  11070  f457				  -
  11071  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11072  f457				  -	      asl	mouseydelta	; *2 because Y resolution is finer
  11073  f457				  -	      ldy	port0resolution
  11074  f457				  -	      dey
  11075  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11076  f457				  -mousey0resolutionfix
  11077  f457				  -	      clc
  11078  f457				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11079  f457				  -	      dey
  11080  f457				  -	      bpl	mousey0resolutionfix
  11081  f457				  -	      clc
  11082  f457				  -	      adc	mousey0
  11083  f457				  -	      sta	mousey0
  11084  f457				  -	      endif		; MOUSEXONLY
  11085  f457				  -
  11086  f457				  -	      ldy	port0resolution
  11087  f457				  -	      dey
  11088  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11089  f457				  -mousex0resolutionfix
  11090  f457				  -	      clc
  11091  f457				  -	      adc	mousexdelta
  11092  f457				  -	      dey
  11093  f457				  -	      bpl	mousex0resolutionfix
  11094  f457				  -	      ifnconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  11095  f457				  -	      clc
  11096  f457				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11097  f457				  -	      sta	mousex0
  11098  f457				  -	      else
  11099  f457				  -	      cpx	#6
  11100  f457				  -	      beq	carryonmouse0boost
  11101  f457				  -	      clc
  11102  f457				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11103  f457				  -	      sta	mousex0
  11104  f457				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11105  f457				  -carryonmouse0boost
  11106  f457				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11107  f457				  -	      clc
  11108  f457				  -	      adc	mousecodey0
  11109  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11110  f457				  -	      clc
  11111  f457				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11112  f457				  -	      tay		; save the target X
  11113  f457				  -	      adc	mousey0	; average in the smoothly-trailing X
  11114  f457				  -	      ror
  11115  f457				  -	      sta	mousex0	; mousex0 now has the smoothly trailing X
  11116  f457				  -	      sty	mousey0	; and mousey0 has the the target X
  11117  f457				  -
  11118  f457				  -			; check to see if the coordinate wrapped. If so, undo the averaging code.
  11119  f457				  -			; A has mousex0, the smoothly trailing X
  11120  f457				  -	      sbc	mousey0	; less the target X
  11121  f457				  -	      bpl	skipabsolutedrive0
  11122  f457				  -	      eor	#$ff
  11123  f457				  -skipabsolutedrive0
  11124  f457				  -	      cmp	#64	; just an unreasonably large change
  11125  f457				  -	      bcc	skipdrivewrapfix0
  11126  f457				  -	      sty	mousex0	; if X wrapped, we catch the trailing X up to the target X
  11127  f457				  -skipdrivewrapfix0
  11128  f457				  -
  11129  f457				  -			; get rid of the tweening if the distance travelled was very small
  11130  f457				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11131  f457				  -	      cmp	port0resolution
  11132  f457				  -	      bcs	skipbetweenfix0
  11133  f457				  -	      lda	mousex0
  11134  f457				  -	      sta	mousey0
  11135  f457				  -skipbetweenfix0
  11136  f457				  -
  11137  f457				  -drivingboostreductioncheck0
  11138  f457				  -			; The below code amounts to mousecodey0=mousecodey0-(mousecodey0/8)
  11139  f457				  -			; +ve mousecodey0 is converted to -ve to do the calculation, and then
  11140  f457				  -			; negated again because truncation during BCD math results in
  11141  f457				  -			; differing magnitudes, depending if the value is +ve or -ve.
  11142  f457				  -driving0fix
  11143  f457				  -	      lax	mousecodey0
  11144  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11145  f457				  -	      bcs	driving0skipnegate1
  11146  f457				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11147  f457				  -	      adc	#1
  11148  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11149  f457				  -driving0skipnegate1
  11150  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11151  f457				  -	      ror
  11152  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11153  f457				  -	      ror
  11154  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11155  f457				  -	      ror
  11156  f457				  -	      sta	inttemp1
  11157  f457				  -	      lda	mousecodey0
  11158  f457				  -	      sec
  11159  f457				  -	      sbc	inttemp1
  11160  f457				  -	      cpx	#$80
  11161  f457				  -	      bcs	driving0skipnegate2
  11162  f457				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11163  f457				  -	      adc	#1
  11164  f457				  -driving0skipnegate2
  11165  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11166  f457				  -drivingboostdone0
  11167  f457				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  11168  f457				  -
  11169  f457				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11170  f457				  -
  11171  f457					      endif		; MOUSE0SUPPORT
  11172  f457
  11173  f457				   mouse1update
  11174  f457				  -	      ifconst	MOUSE1SUPPORT
  11175  f457				  -
  11176  f457				  -mousetableselect =	inttemp2
  11177  f457				  -mousexdelta =	inttemp3
  11178  f457				  -mouseydelta =	inttemp4
  11179  f457				  -lastSWCHA  =	inttemp6
  11180  f457				  -
  11181  f457				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  11182  f457				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  11183  f457				  -
  11184  f457				  -	      lda	#$ff
  11185  f457				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  11186  f457				  -
  11187  f457				  -	      ldy	port1control
  11188  f457				  -
  11189  f457				  -	      lda	#%00010000
  11190  f457				  -	      cpy	#9	; AMIGA?
  11191  f457				  -	      bne	skipamigabitsfix1
  11192  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11193  f457				  -skipamigabitsfix1
  11194  f457				  -	      sta	mousetableselect
  11195  f457				  -	      ifconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  11196  f457				  -	      cpy	#6	; DRIVING?
  11197  f457				  -	      bne	skipdriving1setup
  11198  f457				  -			; swap mousex1 and mousey1. mousex seen by the 7800basic program
  11199  f457				  -			; trails the actual mousex1, so we can smoothly interpolate toward
  11200  f457				  -			; the actual position. This actual position is stored in mousey1
  11201  f457				  -			; after the driver has run.
  11202  f457				  -	      ldx	mousex1
  11203  f457				  -	      lda	mousey1
  11204  f457				  -	      stx	mousey1
  11205  f457				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11206  f457				  -skipdriving1setup
  11207  f457				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  11208  f457				  -
  11209  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11210  f457				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11211  f457				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  11212  f457				  -
  11213  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSETIME
  11214  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11215  f457				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  11216  f457				  -	      else
  11217  f457				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  11218  f457				  -	      endif
  11219  f457				  -	      else
  11220  f457				  -	      lda	#MOUSETIME
  11221  f457				  -	      endif
  11222  f457				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11223  f457				  -
  11224  f457				  -mouse1updateloop
  11225  f457				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11226  f457				  -	      and	#%00001111
  11227  f457				  -	      cmp	lastSWCHA
  11228  f457				  -	      beq	mouse1loopcondition
  11229  f457				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  11230  f457				  -
  11231  f457				  -	      ora	mousetableselect	; atari/amiga decoding table selection
  11232  f457				  -
  11233  f457				  -			; st mice encode on different bits/joystick-lines than amiga mice...
  11234  f457				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  11235  f457				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  11236  f457				  -			; ...so can shuffle the amiga bits to reuse the st driver.
  11237  f457				  -	      tay
  11238  f457				  -	      lax	amigatoataribits,y
  11239  f457				  -
  11240  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11241  f457				  -			; first the Y...
  11242  f457				  -	      and	#%00001100
  11243  f457				  -	      ora	mousecodey1
  11244  f457				  -	      tay
  11245  f457				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11246  f457				  -	      clc
  11247  f457				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11248  f457				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  11249  f457				  -	      tya
  11250  f457				  -	      lsr
  11251  f457				  -	      lsr
  11252  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11253  f457				  -	      txa
  11254  f457				  -			; ...then the X...
  11255  f457				  -	      and	#%00000011
  11256  f457				  -	      tax
  11257  f457				  -	      endif		; !MOUSEXONLY
  11258  f457				  -
  11259  f457				  -	      asl
  11260  f457				  -	      asl
  11261  f457				  -	      ora	mousecodex1
  11262  f457				  -	      tay
  11263  f457				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11264  f457				  -	      adc	mousexdelta	; carry was clear by previous ASL
  11265  f457				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11266  f457				  -	      stx	mousecodex1
  11267  f457				  -mouse1loopcondition
  11268  f457				  -	      lda	TIMINT
  11269  f457				  -	      bpl	mouse1updateloop
  11270  f457				  -
  11271  f457				  -			; *** adapt to selected device resolution.
  11272  f457				  -	      ldx	port1control
  11273  f457				  -
  11274  f457				  -	      ifconst	PRECISIONMOUSING
  11275  f457				  -	      ldy	port1resolution
  11276  f457				  -	      bne	mouse1halveddone
  11277  f457				  -	      cpx	#6	; half-resolution is no good for driving wheels
  11278  f457				  -	      beq	mouse1halveddone
  11279  f457				  -			; resolution=0 is half mouse resolution, necessary for precision
  11280  f457				  -			; mousing on a 160x240 screen with a 1000 dpi mouse.
  11281  f457				  -
  11282  f457				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11283  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11284  f457				  -	      ror		; do a signed divide by 2.
  11285  f457				  -	      clc
  11286  f457				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11287  f457				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11288  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11289  f457				  -	      lda	mouseydelta
  11290  f457				  -	      clc
  11291  f457				  -	      adc	mousey1
  11292  f457				  -	      sta	mousey1
  11293  f457				  -	      endif
  11294  f457				  -			; at half resolution we just exit after updating x and y
  11295  f457				  -	      jmp	LLRET1
  11296  f457				  -mouse1halveddone
  11297  f457				  -	      endif		; PRECISIONMOUSING
  11298  f457				  -
  11299  f457				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11300  f457				  -	      asl	mouseydelta	; *2 because Y resolution is finer
  11301  f457				  -	      ldy	port1resolution
  11302  f457				  -	      dey
  11303  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11304  f457				  -mousey1resolutionfix
  11305  f457				  -	      clc
  11306  f457				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11307  f457				  -	      dey
  11308  f457				  -	      bpl	mousey1resolutionfix
  11309  f457				  -	      clc
  11310  f457				  -	      adc	mousey1
  11311  f457				  -	      sta	mousey1
  11312  f457				  -	      endif		; MOUSEXONLY
  11313  f457				  -
  11314  f457				  -	      ldy	port1resolution
  11315  f457				  -	      dey
  11316  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11317  f457				  -mousex1resolutionfix
  11318  f457				  -	      clc
  11319  f457				  -	      adc	mousexdelta
  11320  f457				  -	      dey
  11321  f457				  -	      bpl	mousex1resolutionfix
  11322  f457				  -	      ifnconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  11323  f457				  -	      clc
  11324  f457				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11325  f457				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11326  f457				  -	      else
  11327  f457				  -	      cpx	#6
  11328  f457				  -	      beq	carryonmouse1boost
  11329  f457				  -	      clc
  11330  f457				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11331  f457				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11332  f457				  -	      jmp	LLRET1
  11333  f457				  -carryonmouse1boost
  11334  f457				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11335  f457				  -	      clc
  11336  f457				  -	      adc	mousecodey1
  11337  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11338  f457				  -	      clc
  11339  f457				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11340  f457				  -	      tay		; save the target X
  11341  f457				  -	      adc	mousey1	; average in the smoothly-trailing X
  11342  f457				  -	      ror
  11343  f457				  -	      sta	mousex1	; mousex0 now has the smoothly trailing X
  11344  f457				  -	      sty	mousey1	; and mousey0 has the the target X
  11345  f457				  -
  11346  f457				  -			; check to see if the coordinate wrapped. If so, undo the averaging code.
  11347  f457				  -			; A has mousex1, the smoothly trailing X
  11348  f457				  -	      sbc	mousey1	; less the target X
  11349  f457				  -	      bpl	skipabsolutedrive1
  11350  f457				  -	      eor	#$ff
  11351  f457				  -skipabsolutedrive1
  11352  f457				  -	      cmp	#64	; just an unreasonably large change
  11353  f457				  -	      bcc	skipdrivewrapfix1
  11354  f457				  -	      sty	mousex1	; if X wrapped, we catch the trailing X up to the target X
  11355  f457				  -skipdrivewrapfix1
  11356  f457				  -
  11357  f457				  -			; get rid of the tweening if the distance travelled was very small
  11358  f457				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11359  f457				  -	      cmp	port1resolution
  11360  f457				  -	      bcs	skipbetweenfix1
  11361  f457				  -	      lda	mousex1
  11362  f457				  -	      sta	mousey1
  11363  f457				  -skipbetweenfix1
  11364  f457				  -
  11365  f457				  -drivingboostreductioncheck1
  11366  f457				  -			; The below code amounts to mousecodey0=mousecodey0-(mousecodey0/8)
  11367  f457				  -			; +ve mousecodey0 is converted to -ve to do the calculation, and then
  11368  f457				  -			; negated again because truncation during BCD math results in
  11369  f457				  -			; differing magnitudes, depending if the value is +ve or -ve.
  11370  f457				  -driving1fix
  11371  f457				  -	      lax	mousecodey1
  11372  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11373  f457				  -	      bcs	driving0skipnegate1
  11374  f457				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11375  f457				  -	      adc	#1
  11376  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11377  f457				  -driving0skipnegate1
  11378  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11379  f457				  -	      ror
  11380  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11381  f457				  -	      ror
  11382  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11383  f457				  -	      ror
  11384  f457				  -	      sta	inttemp1
  11385  f457				  -	      lda	mousecodey1
  11386  f457				  -	      sec
  11387  f457				  -	      sbc	inttemp1
  11388  f457				  -	      cpx	#$80
  11389  f457				  -	      bcs	driving1skipnegate2
  11390  f457				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11391  f457				  -	      adc	#1
  11392  f457				  -driving1skipnegate2
  11393  f457				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11394  f457				  -drivingboostdone1
  11395  f457				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  11396  f457				  -
  11397  f457				  -	      jmp	LLRET1
  11398  f457				  -
  11399  f457					      endif		; MOUSE1SUPPORT
  11400  f457
  11401  f457
  11402  f457				   trakball0update
  11403  f457				  -	      ifconst	TRAKBALL0SUPPORT
  11404  f457				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKTIME
  11405  f457				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11406  f457				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  11407  f457				  -	      else		; !TRAKXONLY
  11408  f457				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  11409  f457				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11410  f457				  -	      else		; !TRAKTIME
  11411  f457				  -	      lda	#TRAKTIME
  11412  f457				  -	      endif		; !TRAKTIME
  11413  f457				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11414  f457				  -	      ldx	#0
  11415  f457				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11416  f457				  -	      ldy	#0
  11417  f457				  -	      endif		; TRAKXONLY
  11418  f457				  -trakball0updateloop
  11419  f457				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11420  f457				  -	      and	#%00110000
  11421  f457				  -	      cmp	trakballcodex0
  11422  f457				  -	      sta	trakballcodex0
  11423  f457				  -	      beq	trakball0movementXdone
  11424  f457				  -	      and	#%00010000
  11425  f457				  -	      beq	trakball0negativeX
  11426  f457				  -trakball0positiveX
  11427  f457				  -			;(2 from beq)
  11428  f457				  -	      inx		; 2
  11429  f457				  -	      jmp	trakball0movementXdone	; 3
  11430  f457				  -trakball0negativeX
  11431  f457				  -			;(3 from beq)
  11432  f457				  -	      dex		; 2
  11433  f457				  -	      nop		; 2
  11434  f457				  -trakball0movementXdone
  11435  f457				  -
  11436  f457				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11437  f457				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11438  f457				  -	      and	#%11000000
  11439  f457				  -	      cmp	trakballcodey0
  11440  f457				  -	      sta	trakballcodey0
  11441  f457				  -	      beq	trakball0movementYdone
  11442  f457				  -	      and	#%01000000
  11443  f457				  -	      beq	trakball0negativeY
  11444  f457				  -trakball0positiveY
  11445  f457				  -			;(2 from beq)
  11446  f457				  -	      iny		; 2
  11447  f457				  -	      jmp	trakball0movementYdone	; 3
  11448  f457				  -trakball0negativeY
  11449  f457				  -			;(3 from beq)
  11450  f457				  -	      dey		; 2
  11451  f457				  -	      nop		; 2
  11452  f457				  -trakball0movementYdone
  11453  f457				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11454  f457				  -
  11455  f457				  -	      lda	TIMINT
  11456  f457				  -	      bpl	trakball0updateloop
  11457  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11458  f457				  -	      cpx	#0
  11459  f457				  -	      beq	trakball0skipXadjust
  11460  f457				  -	      clc
  11461  f457				  -trakball0Xloop
  11462  f457				  -	      adc	port0resolution
  11463  f457				  -	      dex
  11464  f457				  -	      bne	trakball0Xloop
  11465  f457				  -	      clc
  11466  f457				  -	      adc	trakballx0
  11467  f457				  -	      sta	trakballx0
  11468  f457				  -trakball0skipXadjust
  11469  f457				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11470  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11471  f457				  -	      cpy	#0
  11472  f457				  -	      beq	trakball0skipYadjust
  11473  f457				  -	      clc
  11474  f457				  -trakball0yloop

  11476  f457				  -	      dey

  11481  f457				  -trakball0skipYadjust
  11482  f457				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11483  f457				  -
  11484  f457				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11485  f457					      endif
