  11489  f457				   trakball1update
  11490  f457				  -	      ifconst	TRAKBALL1SUPPORT
  11491  f457				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKTIME
  11492  f457				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11493  f457				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  11494  f457				  -	      else		; !TRAKXONLY
  11495  f457				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  11496  f457				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY

  11501  f457				  -	      ldx	#0

  11504  f457				  -	      endif		; TRAKXONLY
  11505  f457				  -trakball1updateloop

  11519  f457				  -	      dex		; 2

  11540  f457				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11541  f457				  -

  11580  f457				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11581  f457				  -

  11586  f457				  -skippaddle0setposition

  11591  f457				  -skippaddle1setposition

  11696  f457
  11697  f457				   paddlebuttonhandler		; outside of conditional, for button-handler LUT
  11698  f457				  -	      ifconst	PADDLESUPPORT
  11699  f457				  -			; x=0|1 for port, rather than paddle #.
  11700  f457				  -			; Only the first paddle button will integrate into "joy0fire" testing. If the
  11701  f457				  -			; game wants to support 2 paddles, up to the game to instead test the
  11702  f457				  -			; joystick right+left directions instead.
  11703  f457				  -	      lda	SWCHA	; top of nibble is first paddle button
  11704  f457				  -	      cpx	#0	; port 0?
  11705  f457				  -	      beq	skippaddleport2shift
  11706  f457				  -	      asl		; shift second port to upper nibble
  11707  f457				  -	      asl
  11708  f457				  -	      asl
  11709  f457				  -	      asl
  11710  f457				  -skippaddleport2shift
  11711  f457				  -	      and	#%11000000
  11712  f457				  -	      eor	#%11000000	; invert
  11713  f457				  -	      sta	sINPT1,x
  11714  f457				  -	      jmp	buttonreadloopreturn
  11715  f457					      endif		; PADDLESUPPORT
  11716  f457
  11717  f457				   mousebuttonhandler		; outside of conditional, for button-handler LUT
  11718  f457				  -	      ifconst	MOUSESUPPORT
  11719  f457				  -			; stick the mouse buttons in the correct shadow register...
  11720  f457				  -	      txa
  11721  f457				  -	      asl
  11722  f457				  -	      tay		; y=x*2
  11723  f457				  -	      lda	INPT4,x
  11724  f457				  -	      eor	#%10000000
  11725  f457				  -	      lsr
  11726  f457				  -	      sta	sINPT1,x
  11727  f457				  -
  11728  f457				  -	      lda	INPT1,y
  11729  f457				  -	      and	#%10000000
  11730  f457				  -	      eor	#%10000000
  11731  f457				  -	      ora	sINPT1,x
  11732  f457				  -	      sta	sINPT1,x
  11733  f457				  -	      jmp	buttonreadloopreturn
  11734  f457					      endif		; MOUSESUPPORT
  11735  f457
  11736  f457				  -	      ifconst	KEYPADSUPPORT
  11737  f457				  -			; ** select keypad rows 0 to 3 over 4 frames...
  11738  f457				  -keypadrowselect
  11739  f457				  -	      inc	keypadcounter
  11740  f457				  -	      ldy	#0
  11741  f457				  -	      lda	port0control
  11742  f457				  -	      cmp	#7
  11743  f457				  -	      bne	skipport0val
  11744  f457				  -	      iny		; y=y+1
  11745  f457				  -skipport0val
  11746  f457				  -	      lda	port1control
  11747  f457				  -	      cmp	#7
  11748  f457				  -	      bne	skipport1val
  11749  f457				  -	      iny
  11750  f457				  -	      iny		; y=y+2
  11751  f457				  -skipport1val
  11752  f457				  -	      cpy	#0
  11753  f457				  -	      beq	exitkeypadrowselect
  11754  f457				  -	      lda	keyrowdirectionmask,y
  11755  f457				  -	      sta	CTLSWA
  11756  f457				  -	      tya
  11757  f457				  -	      asl
  11758  f457				  -	      asl
  11759  f457				  -	      sta	inttemp1
  11760  f457				  -	      lda	keypadcounter
  11761  f457				  -	      and	#3
  11762  f457				  -	      ora	inttemp1
  11763  f457				  -	      tax
  11764  f457				  -	      lda	keyrowselectvalue,x
  11765  f457				  -	      sta	SWCHA
  11766  f457				  -exitkeypadrowselect
  11767  f457				  -	      rts
  11768  f457				  -
  11769  f457				  -keyrowdirectionmask
  11770  f457				  -	      .byte	#%00000000	; 0 : port0=input port1=input
  11771  f457				  -	      .byte	#%11110000	; 1 : port0=output port1=input
  11772  f457				  -	      .byte	#%00001111	; 2 : port0=input port1=output
  11773  f457				  -	      .byte	#%11111111	; 3 : port0=output port1=output
  11774  f457				  -
  11775  f457				  -keyrowselectvalue
  11776  f457				  -	      .byte	#%00000000, #%00000000, #%00000000, #%00000000	; no row selected, all pins high, always
  11777  f457				  -	      .byte	#%11100000, #%11010000, #%10110000, #%01110000	; p0 keypad in
  11778  f457				  -	      .byte	#%00001110, #%00001101, #%00001011, #%00000111	; p1 keypad in
  11779  f457				  -	      .byte	#%11101110, #%11011101, #%10111011, #%01110111	; p0+p1 keypads in
  11780  f457					      endif		; KEYPADSUPPORT
  11781  f457
  11782  f457				  -	      ifconst	KEYPADSUPPORT
  11783  f457				  -			; TODO - split into compile-time KEYPAD0SUPPORT and KEYPAD1SUPPORT
  11784  f457				  -keypadcolumnread
  11785  f457				  -	      lda	port0control
  11786  f457				  -	      cmp	#7
  11787  f457				  -	      bne	skipkeypadcolumnread0
  11788  f457				  -	      lda	keypadcounter
  11789  f457				  -	      and	#3
  11790  f457				  -	      asl		; x2 because keypad variables are interleaved
  11791  f457				  -	      tax
  11792  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11793  f457				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix0a,x
  11794  f457				  -	      lda	INPT0
  11795  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11796  f457				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix0a,x
  11797  f457				  -	      lda	INPT1
  11798  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11799  f457				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix0a,x
  11800  f457				  -	      lda	INPT4
  11801  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11802  f457				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix0a,x
  11803  f457				  -	      lda	keypadmatrix0a,x
  11804  f457				  -	      eor	#%00000111
  11805  f457				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix0a,x
  11806  f457				  -skipkeypadcolumnread0
  11807  f457				  -
  11808  f457				  -	      lda	port1control
  11809  f457				  -	      cmp	#7
  11810  f457				  -	      bne	skipkeypadcolumnread1
  11811  f457				  -	      lda	keypadcounter
  11812  f457				  -	      and	#3
  11813  f457				  -	      asl		; x2 because keypad variables are interleaved
  11814  f457				  -	      tax
  11815  f457				  -	      lda	#0
  11816  f457				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix1a,x
  11817  f457				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  11818  f457				  -	      lda	INPT2
  11819  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11820  f457				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  11821  f457				  -	      lda	INPT3
  11822  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11823  f457				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  11824  f457				  -	      lda	INPT5
  11825  f457				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11826  f457				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  11827  f457				  -	      lda	keypadmatrix1a,x
  11828  f457				  -	      eor	#%00000111
  11829  f457				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix1a,x
  11830  f457				  -skipkeypadcolumnread1
  11831  f457				  -	      rts
  11832  f457					      endif		; KEYPADSUPPORT
  11833  f457
  11834  f457				   setportforinput
  11835  f457		       ad 81 02 	      lda	CTLSWA
  11836  f45a		       3d c2 f1 	      and	SWCHA_DIRMASK,x
  11837  f45d		       8d 81 02 	      sta	CTLSWA
  11838  f460		       60		      rts
  11839  f461
  11840  f461				   setonebuttonmode
  11841  f461		       a9 06		      lda	#6	; in case we're in unlocked-bios mode
  11842  f463		       85 01		      sta	VBLANK	; if we were on paddles, the line is grounded out.
  11843  f465		       a9 14		      lda	#$14
  11844  f467		       8d 83 02 	      sta	CTLSWB
  11845  f46a		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB
  11846  f46d		       1d 87 f4 	      ora	thisjoy2buttonbit,x	; disable: write 1 to the 2-button bit
  11847  f470		       8d 82 02 	      sta	SWCHB
  11848  f473		       60		      rts
  11849  f474
  11850  f474				   settwobuttonmode
  11851  f474		       a9 06		      lda	#6	; in case we're in unlocked-bios mode
  11852  f476		       85 01		      sta	VBLANK	; if we were on paddles, the line is grounded out.
  11853  f478		       a9 14		      lda	#$14
  11854  f47a		       8d 83 02 	      sta	CTLSWB
  11855  f47d		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB
  11856  f480		       3d 88 f4 	      and	thisjoy2buttonbit+1,x	; enable: write 0 to the 2-button bit
  11857  f483		       8d 82 02 	      sta	SWCHB
  11858  f486		       60		      rts
  11859  f487
  11860  f487				   thisjoy2buttonbit
  11861  f487							; p0	p1   p0
  11862  f487		       04 10 04 	      .byte.b	$04, $10, $04
  11863  f48a
  11864  f48a				  -	      ifconst	CHANGEDMAHOLES
  11865  f48a				  -removedmaholes
  11866  f48a				  -	      ldx	#0
  11867  f48a				  -removedllholesloop
  11868  f48a				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  11869  f48a				  -	      and	#%10001111
  11870  f48a				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  11871  f48a				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  11872  f48a				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  11873  f48a				  -	      endif
  11874  f48a				  -	      inx
  11875  f48a				  -	      inx
  11876  f48a				  -	      inx
  11877  f48a				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  11878  f48a				  -	      cpx	#DBOFFSET
  11879  f48a				  -	      bcc	removedllholesloop
  11880  f48a				  -	      else
  11881  f48a				  -	      bpl	removedllholesloop
  11882  f48a				  -	      endif
  11883  f48a				  -	      rts
  11884  f48a				  -
  11885  f48a				  -createdmaholes
  11886  f48a				  -	      ldx	#0
  11887  f48a				  -createdllholesloop
  11888  f48a				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  11889  f48a				  -	      ora	#(WZONEHEIGHT*4)
  11890  f48a				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  11891  f48a				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  11892  f48a				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  11893  f48a				  -	      endif
  11894  f48a				  -	      inx
  11895  f48a				  -	      inx
  11896  f48a				  -	      inx
  11897  f48a				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  11898  f48a				  -	      cpx	#DBOFFSET
  11899  f48a				  -	      bcc	createdllholesloop
  11900  f48a				  -	      else
  11901  f48a				  -	      bpl	createdllholesloop
  11902  f48a				  -	      endif
  11903  f48a				  -	      rts
  11904  f48a					      endif
  11905  f48a
  11906  f48a							; Provided under the CC0 license. See the included LICENSE.txt for details.
  11907  f48a
  11908  f48a				   START
  11909  f48a				   start
  11910  f48a
  11911  f48a							;******** more or less the Atari recommended startup procedure
  11912  f48a
  11913  f48a		       78		      sei
  11914  f48b		       d8		      cld
  11915  f48c
  11916  f48c					      ifnconst	NOTIALOCK
  11917  f48c		       a9 07		      lda	#$07
  11918  f48e				  -	      else
  11919  f48e				  -	      lda	#$06
  11920  f48e					      endif
  11921  f48e		       85 01		      sta	INPTCTRL	;lock 7800 into 7800 mode
  11922  f490		       a9 7f		      lda	#$7F
  11923  f492		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL	;disable DMA
  11924  f494		       a9 00		      lda	#$00
  11925  f496		       85 38		      sta	OFFSET
  11926  f498					      ifnconst	NOTIALOCK
  11927  f498		       85 01		      sta	INPTCTRL
  11928  f49a		       85 20		      sta	BACKGRND	; black default, in case a flash cart is using something else
  11929  f49c					      endif
  11930  f49c		       a2 ff		      ldx	#$FF
  11931  f49e		       9a		      txs
  11932  f49f
  11933  f49f							;************** Clear Memory
  11934  f49f
  11935  f49f							; ** Clear 1800-27FF, pg0+pg1 memory.
  11936  f49f				   ClearMemPages
  11937  f49f		       a9 00		      lda	#0
  11938  f4a1		       a8		      tay		; y=0
  11939  f4a2		       85 80		      sta	$80
  11940  f4a4		       a2 18		      ldx	#$18
  11941  f4a6				   ClearMemPagesLoop
  11942  f4a6		       86 81		      stx	$81	; needed for when we step on ZP memory
  11943  f4a8		       91 80		      sta	($80),y	;Store data
  11944  f4aa		       c8		      iny		;Next byte
  11945  f4ab		       d0 f9		      bne	ClearMemPagesLoop
  11946  f4ad		       e8		      inx
  11947  f4ae		       e0 28		      cpx	#$28
  11948  f4b0		       d0 f4		      bne	ClearMemPagesLoop
  11949  f4b2		       85 81		      sta	$81
  11950  f4b4
  11951  f4b4							;seed random number with hopefully-random timer value
  11952  f4b4		       a9 01		      lda	#1
  11953  f4b6		       0d 84 02 	      ora	INTIM
  11954  f4b9		       85 40		      sta	rand
  11955  f4bb
  11956  f4bb							; detect the console type...
  11957  f4bb				   pndetectvblankstart
  11958  f4bb		       a5 28		      lda	MSTAT
  11959  f4bd		       10 fc		      bpl	pndetectvblankstart	; if we're not in VBLANK, wait for it to start
  11960  f4bf				   pndetectvblankover
  11961  f4bf		       a5 28		      lda	MSTAT
  11962  f4c1		       30 fc		      bmi	pndetectvblankover	; then wait for it to be over
  11963  f4c3		       a0 00		      ldy	#$00
  11964  f4c5		       a2 00		      ldx	#$00
  11965  f4c7				   pndetectvblankhappening
  11966  f4c7		       a5 28		      lda	MSTAT
  11967  f4c9		       30 07		      bmi	pndetectinvblank	; if VBLANK starts, exit our counting loop
  11968  f4cb		       85 24		      sta	WSYNC
  11969  f4cd		       85 24		      sta	WSYNC
  11970  f4cf		       e8		      inx
  11971  f4d0		       d0 f5		      bne	pndetectvblankhappening
  11972  f4d2				   pndetectinvblank
  11973  f4d2		       e0 7d		      cpx	#125
  11974  f4d4		       90 02		      bcc	pndetecispal
  11975  f4d6		       a0 01		      ldy	#$01
  11976  f4d8				   pndetecispal
  11977  f4d8		       8c 09 21 	      sty	paldetected
  11978  f4db
  11979  f4db		       20 eb f3 	      jsr	createallgamedlls
  11980  f4de
  11981  f4de		       a9 18		      lda	#>DLLMEM
  11982  f4e0		       85 2c		      sta	DPPH
  11983  f4e2		       a9 00		      lda	#<DLLMEM
  11984  f4e4		       85 30		      sta	DPPL
  11985  f4e6
  11986  f4e6				  -	      ifconst	pokeysupport
  11987  f4e6				  -			; pokey support is compiled in, so try to detect it...
  11988  f4e6				  -	      jsr	detectpokeylocation
  11989  f4e6					      endif
  11990  f4e6
  11991  f4e6		       a9 01		      lda	#1	; default for port 0 and 1 is a regular joystick
  11992  f4e8		       8d b8 01 	      sta	port0control
  11993  f4eb		       8d b9 01 	      sta	port1control
  11994  f4ee
  11995  f4ee							;Setup port A to read mode
  11996  f4ee							;lda #$00
  11997  f4ee							;sta SWCHA
  11998  f4ee							;sta CTLSWA
  11999  f4ee
  12000  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	HSSUPPORT
  12001  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode
  12002  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	included.hiscore.asm.bank
  12003  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
  12004  f4ee				  -	      lda	#($18 | included.hiscore.asm.bank)
  12005  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12006  f4ee				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12007  f4ee				  -	      endif
  12008  f4ee				  -	      sta	$3000
  12009  f4ee				  -	      else
  12010  f4ee				  -	      lda	#(included.hiscore.asm.bank)
  12011  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12012  f4ee				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12013  f4ee				  -	      endif
  12014  f4ee				  -	      sta	$8000
  12015  f4ee				  -	      endif
  12016  f4ee				  -	      endif		; included.hiscore.asm.bank
  12017  f4ee				  -	      endif		; bankswitchmode
  12018  f4ee				  -			; try to detect HSC
  12019  f4ee				  -	      jsr	detecthsc
  12020  f4ee				  -	      and	#1
  12021  f4ee				  -	      sta	hsdevice
  12022  f4ee				  -skipHSCdetect
  12023  f4ee				  -			; try to detect AtariVox eeprom
  12024  f4ee				  -	      jsr	detectatarivoxeeprom
  12025  f4ee				  -	      and	#2
  12026  f4ee				  -	      ora	hsdevice
  12027  f4ee				  -	      cmp	#3
  12028  f4ee				  -	      bne	storeAinhsdevice
  12029  f4ee				  -			; For now, we tie break by giving HSC priority over AtariVox.
  12030  f4ee				  -			; Later we should check each device's priority byte if set, instead,
  12031  f4ee				  -	      lda	#2
  12032  f4ee				  -storeAinhsdevice
  12033  f4ee				  -	      sta	hsdevice
  12034  f4ee				  -	      lda	#$ff
  12035  f4ee				  -	      sta	hsdifficulty
  12036  f4ee				  -	      sta	hsgameslot
  12037  f4ee				  -	      sta	hsnewscoreline
  12038  f4ee					      endif		; HSSUPPORT
  12039  f4ee
  12040  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	AVOXVOICE
  12041  f4ee				  -	      jsr	silenceavoxvoice
  12042  f4ee					      endif
  12043  f4ee
  12044  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	MULTIBUTTON
  12045  f4ee				  -	      ifnconst	HSSUPPORT
  12046  f4ee				  -min_detectatarivoxeeprom
  12047  f4ee				  -	      jsr	i2c_startwrite
  12048  f4ee				  -	      bcc	min_no_eeprom_error
  12049  f4ee				  -	      lda	#$ff
  12050  f4ee				  -	      jmp	min_avoxdetect_done
  12051  f4ee				  -min_no_eeprom_error
  12052  f4ee				  -	      lda	#$30
  12053  f4ee				  -	      jsr	i2c_txbyte
  12054  f4ee				  -	      lda	#$00
  12055  f4ee				  -	      jsr	i2c_txbyte
  12056  f4ee				  -	      jsr	i2c_stopwrite
  12057  f4ee				  -min_avoxdetect_done
  12058  f4ee				  -	      eor	#$FF
  12059  f4ee				  -	      sta	avoxdetected
  12060  f4ee				  -	      jmp	min_detectatarivoxeepromdone
  12061  f4ee				  -	      include	"i2c7800.inc"
  12062  f4ee				  -	      I2C_SUBS	temp9
  12063  f4ee				  -min_detectatarivoxeepromdone
  12064  f4ee				  -	      endif		; HSSUPPORT
  12065  f4ee					      endif		; MULTIBUTTON
  12066  f4ee
  12067  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	MULTIBUTTON
  12068  f4ee				  -	      lda	avoxdetected
  12069  f4ee				  -	      beq	skipassignavox
  12070  f4ee				  -	      lda	#10
  12071  f4ee				  -	      sta	port1control	; designate port 1 as atarivox so multibutton won't disturb it.
  12072  f4ee				  -skipassignavox
  12073  f4ee					      endif		; MULTIBUTTON
  12074  f4ee
  12075  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	RMT
  12076  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	RMTVOLUME
  12077  f4ee				  -	      lda	#$F0	; default to full RMT volume
  12078  f4ee				  -	      sta	rmtvolume
  12079  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
  12080  f4ee				  -	      sta	tiavolume
  12081  f4ee				  -	      endif		; TIAVOLUME
  12082  f4ee				  -	      endif		; RMTVOLUME
  12083  f4ee					      else		; !RMT
  12084  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
  12085  f4ee				  -	      lda	#$F0	; default to full TIA volume
  12086  f4ee				  -	      sta	tiavolume
  12087  f4ee					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
  12088  f4ee					      endif		; RMT
  12089  f4ee
  12090  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode
  12091  f4ee				  -			; we need to switch to the first bank as a default. this needs to
  12092  f4ee				  -			; happen before DMA, in case there's a topscreenroutine in bank 0
  12093  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
  12094  f4ee				  -	      lda	#$18	; xxx11nnn - switch to bank 0
  12095  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12096  f4ee				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12097  f4ee				  -	      endif
  12098  f4ee				  -	      sta	$3000
  12099  f4ee				  -	      else
  12100  f4ee				  -	      lda	#0
  12101  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12102  f4ee				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12103  f4ee				  -	      endif
  12104  f4ee				  -	      sta	$8000
  12105  f4ee				  -	      endif
  12106  f4ee					      endif
  12107  f4ee
  12108  f4ee							; CTRL 76543210
  12109  f4ee							; 7 colorburst kill
  12110  f4ee							; 6,5 dma ctrl 2=normal DMA, 3=no DMA
  12111  f4ee							; 4 character width 1=2 byte chars, 0=1 byte chars
  12112  f4ee							; 3 border control 0=background color border, 1=black border
  12113  f4ee							; 2 kangaroo mode 0=transparency, 1=kangaroo
  12114  f4ee							; 1,0 read mode 0=160x2/160x4 1=N/A 2=320B/320D 3=320A/320C
  12115  f4ee
  12116  f4ee				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE
  12117  f4ee				  -	      lda	#%01010000	;Enable DMA, mode=160x2/160x4, 2x character width
  12118  f4ee					      else
  12119  f4ee		       a9 40		      lda	#%01000000	;Enable DMA, mode=160x2/160x4
  12120  f4f0					      endif
  12121  f4f0
  12122  f4f0		       20 4e f4 	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; give the some vblank time to minimally update the display
  12123  f4f3
  12124  f4f3		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL
  12125  f4f5		       8d 07 21 	      sta	sCTRL
  12126  f4f8
  12127  f4f8		       20 de f3 	      jsr	vblankresync
  12128  f4fb
  12129  f4fb		       a2 01		      ldx	#1
  12130  f4fd		       20 74 f4 	      jsr	settwobuttonmode
  12131  f500		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
  12132  f502		       20 74 f4 	      jsr	settwobuttonmode

  12135  f505		       4c 00 80 	      jmp	game
  12136  f508				  -	      else
  12137  f508				  -	      jmp	.altgamestart
  12138  f508					      endif
  12139  f508
  12140  f508							; Provided under the CC0 license. See the included LICENSE.txt for details.
  12141  f508
  12142  f508							; A tunable parameter, to claim some memory back from DL usage
  12143  f508		       00 00	   MEMSKIP    =	$00
  12144  f508
  12145  f508							;************** Setup DLL entries
  12146  f508
  12147  f508							; setup some working definitions, to avoid ifnconst mess elsewhere...
  12148  f508					      ifnconst	SCREENHEIGHT
  12149  f508		       00 c0	   WSCREENHEIGHT =	192
  12150  f508				  -	      else
  12151  f508				  -WSCREENHEIGHT =	SCREENHEIGHT
  12152  f508					      endif
  12153  f508
  12154  f508				  -	      ifnconst	ZONEHEIGHT
  12155  f508				  -WZONEHEIGHT =	16
  12156  f508					      else
  12157  f508		       00 10	   WZONEHEIGHT =	ZONEHEIGHT
  12158  f508					      endif
  12159  f508
  12160  f508					      ifnconst	ZONECOUNT
  12161  f508				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  12162  f508				  -WZONECOUNT =	((WSCREENHEIGHT/WZONEHEIGHT)+1)
  12163  f508					      else		; !VSCROLL
  12164  f508		       00 0c	   WZONECOUNT =	(WSCREENHEIGHT/WZONEHEIGHT)
  12165  f508					      endif		; !VSCROLL
  12166  f508				  -	      else
  12167  f508				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  12168  f508				  -WZONECOUNT =	(ZONECOUNT+1)
  12169  f508				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
  12170  f508				  -WZONECOUNT =	ZONECOUNT
  12171  f508				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
  12172  f508					      endif
  12173  f508
  12174  f508							; top of the frame, non-visible lines. this is based on NTSC,
  12175  f508							; but we add in extra NV lines at the end of the display to ensure
  12176  f508							; our PAL friends can play the game without it crashing.
  12177  f508		       00 19	   NVLINES    =	((243-WSCREENHEIGHT)/2)
  12178  f508
  12179  f508					      ifnconst	DLMEMSTART
  12180  f508					      ifnconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12181  f508				   WDLMEMSTART SET	$1880
  12182  f508				  -	      else
  12183  f508				  -WDLMEMSTART SET	$18E0
  12184  f508					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  12185  f508				  -	      else
  12186  f508				  -WDLMEMSTART SET	DLMEMSTART
  12187  f508					      endif
  12188  f508
  12189  f508				  -	      if	MEMSKIP > 0
  12190  f508				  -	      echo	"   ",[WDLMEMSTART],"to",[WDLMEMSTART+MEMSKIP-1],"was freed for game usage with MEMSKIP."
  12191  f508				  -WDLMEMSTART SET	(WDLMEMSTART + MEMSKIP)
  12192  f508					      endif		; MEMSKIP > 0
  12193  f508
  12194  f508					      ifnconst	DLMEMEND
  12195  f508				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12196  f508				  -WDLMEMEND  =	$23FF
  12197  f508					      else
  12198  f508		       1f ff	   WDLMEMEND  =	$1FFF
  12199  f508					      endif
  12200  f508				  -	      else
  12201  f508				  -WDLMEMEND  =	DLMEMEND
  12202  f508					      endif
  12203  f508
  12204  f508
  12205  f508				   WMEMSIZE   SET	(WDLMEMEND-WDLMEMSTART+1)
  12206  f508
  12207  f508				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  12208  f508				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12209  f508				  -			; give the last zone extra ram for the dma mask objects...
  12210  f508				  -WMEMSIZE   SET	(WMEMSIZE-(maskscrollspriteend-maskscrollsprite))
  12211  f508				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  12212  f508					      endif		; VSCROLL
  12213  f508
  12214  f508					      ifnconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12215  f508		       00 9b	   DLLASTOBJ  =	((((WMEMSIZE/WZONECOUNT)-2)/5)*5)	; -2 to always ensure we have 1x double-byte terminator
  12216  f508				  -	      else
  12217  f508				  -DLLASTOBJ  =	((((WMEMSIZE/WZONECOUNT)-4)/10)*5)	; -4 to always ensure we have 2x double-byte terminators
  12218  f508					      endif
  12219  f508
  12220  f508		       00 9d	   TDOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET =	(DLLASTOBJ+2)	; offset between DL buffers. ie. half the real DL
  12221  f508				  -	      if	TDOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET > 255
  12222  f508				  -DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET =	255
  12223  f508					      else
  12224  f508		       00 9d	   DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET =	(DLLASTOBJ+2)
  12225  f508					      endif
  12226  f508
  12227  f508				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12228  f508				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	$2300
  12229  f508					      endif
  12230  f508
  12231  f508				   DLPOINTH
  12232  f508				   DLINDEX    SET	0
  12233  f508					      REPEAT	WZONECOUNT
  12234  f508				   TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(((DLINDEX*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART)
  12235  f508				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12236  f508				  -	      if	TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12237  f508				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12238  f508				  -	      else
  12239  f508				  -	      if	((((DLINDEX+1)*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART) > $1FFF
  12240  f508				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12241  f508				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12242  f508				  -	      endif
  12243  f508				  -	      endif		; TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12244  f508					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY
  12245  f508							;echo " "," ZONE",[DLINDEX]d,"ADDRESS: ",TMPMEMADDRESS
  12246  f508		       18		      .byte.b	>TMPMEMADDRESS
  12247  f508				   DLINDEX    SET	DLINDEX + 1
  12233  f508					      REPEND
  12234  f508				   TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(((DLINDEX*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART)
  12235  f509				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12236  f509				  -	      if	TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12237  f509				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12238  f509				  -	      else
  12239  f509				  -	      if	((((DLINDEX+1)*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART) > $1FFF
  12240  f509				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12241  f509				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12242  f509				  -	      endif
  12243  f509				  -	      endif		; TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12244  f509					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY
  12245  f509							;echo " "," ZONE",[DLINDEX]d,"ADDRESS: ",TMPMEMADDRESS
  12246  f509		       19		      .byte.b	>TMPMEMADDRESS
  12247  f509				   DLINDEX    SET	DLINDEX + 1
  12233  f509					      REPEND
  12234  f509				   TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(((DLINDEX*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART)
  12235  f50a				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12236  f50a				  -	      if	TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12237  f50a				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12238  f50a				  -	      else
  12239  f50a				  -	      if	((((DLINDEX+1)*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART) > $1FFF
  12240  f50a				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12241  f50a				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12242  f50a				  -	      endif
  12243  f50a				  -	      endif		; TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12244  f50a					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY
  12245  f50a							;echo " "," ZONE",[DLINDEX]d,"ADDRESS: ",TMPMEMADDRESS
  12246  f50a		       19		      .byte.b	>TMPMEMADDRESS
  12247  f50a				   DLINDEX    SET	DLINDEX + 1
  12233  f50a					      REPEND
  12234  f50a				   TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(((DLINDEX*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART)
  12235  f50b				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12236  f50b				  -	      if	TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12237  f50b				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)

  12282  f520				  -	      endif

  12284  f520					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY

  12300  f52c							; Provided under the CC0 license. See the included LICENSE.txt for details.
  12301  f52c
  12302  f52c							; a simple guard, than ensures the 7800basic code hasn't
  12303  f52c							; spilled into the encryption area...
     2642 bytes left in the 7800basic reserved area.
  12304  f52c					      echo	"   ",($FF7E-*)d,"bytes left in the 7800basic reserved area."
  12305  f52c				  -	      if	(*>$FF7D)
  12306  f52c				  -	      echo
  12307  f52c				  -	      echo	"***************************"
  12308  f52c				  -	      echo	"*** Abort: ROM Overflow ***"
  12309  f52c				  -	      echo	"***************************"
  12310  f52c				  -	      ERR		; abort the assembly
  12311  f52c					      endif
  12312  f52c
  12313  f52c							; throw a compile
  12314  f52c				  -	      ifconst	RMT
  12315  f52c				  -	      ifnconst	pokeysupport
  12316  f52c				  -	      echo
  12317  f52c				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12318  f52c				  -	      echo	"*** ABORT: RMT Tracker requires 'set pokeysupport $xxxx' ***"
  12319  f52c				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12320  f52c				  -	      ERR		; abort
  12321  f52c				  -	      endif		; pokeysupport
  12322  f52c				  -	      ifnconst	pokeyaddress
  12323  f52c				  -	      echo
  12324  f52c				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12325  f52c				  -	      echo	"*** ABORT: RMT Tracker requires 'set pokeysupport $xxxx' ***"
  12326  f52c				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12327  f52c				  -	      ERR		; abort
  12328  f52c				  -	      endif		; pokeyaddress
  12329  f52c					      endif

  12335  f52c				  -	      echo	"* the 4k 7800basic area has",[($FF7E - *)]d,"bytes free."

  12347  f52c					      endif
  12348  f52c				   START_OF_ROM SET	0
  12349  f52c
  12350  f52c							; FF7E/FF7F contains the 7800basic crc checksum word
  12351  f52c
  12352  f52c							; FF80 - FFF7 contains the 7800 encryption key
  12353  f52c
  12354  f52c					      ifnconst	bankswitchmode
  12355  fff8					      ORG	$FFF8
  12356  fff8				  -	      else
  12357  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM128K
  12358  fff8				  -	      ORG	$27FF8
  12359  fff8				  -	      RORG	$FFF8
  12360  fff8				  -	      endif
  12361  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM144K
  12362  fff8				  -	      ORG	$27FF8
  12363  fff8				  -	      RORG	$FFF8
  12364  fff8				  -	      endif
  12365  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM256K
  12366  fff8				  -	      ORG	$47FF8
  12367  fff8				  -	      RORG	$FFF8
  12368  fff8				  -	      endif
  12369  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM272K
  12370  fff8				  -	      ORG	$47FF8
  12371  fff8				  -	      RORG	$FFF8
  12372  fff8				  -	      endif
  12373  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM512K
  12374  fff8				  -	      ORG	$87FF8
  12375  fff8				  -	      RORG	$FFF8
  12376  fff8				  -	      endif
  12377  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM528K
  12378  fff8				  -	      ORG	$87FF8
  12379  fff8				  -	      RORG	$FFF8
  12380  fff8				  -	      endif
  12381  fff8					      endif
  12382  fff8
  12383  fff8
  12384  fff8		       ff		      .byte.b	$FF	; region verification. $FF=all regions
  12385  fff9		       f7		      .byte.b	$F7	; high nibble:  encryption check from $N000 to $FF7F. we only hash the last 4k for faster boot.
  12386  fffa							; low nibble :  N=7 atari rainbow start, N=3 no atari rainbow
  12387  fffa
  12388  fffa							;Vectors
  12389  fffa		       00 f0		      .word.w	NMI
  12390  fffc		       8a f4		      .word.w	START
  12391  fffe		       5f f0		      .word.w	IRQ
  12392  10000
